SA15arhebt_u:301_2: 92a.] nānekāntaḥ, aparebhyo 'parebhyaś ca pratyayebhyaḥ pratikṣaṇam utpatteḥ kṣaṇikānāṃ bhinnaśaktitvād antyakṣaṇavaj janakasvabhāvatāvirahāt kutas tair apy anekāntaḥ syāt? na hi kāraṇabhedopadhīyamānajanmanāṃ viśeṣānupalakṣaṇe 'py abhinnasvabhāvatā yuktā,
SA15arhebt_u:301_4: tathā ca vakṣyati -- `aparāparapratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ santanvantaḥ saṃskārā yady api kutaścit sāmyāt samānarūpāḥ pratīyante tathāpi bhinna eva eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:301_5: tena kiñcid eva kasyacit kāraṇam' iti /
SA15arhebt_u:301_6: yad uktaṃ `tatsvabhāvasya jananāt' ity asyānekāntam udbhāvayann āha paraḥ -- te bījakṣityādayaḥ antyāḥ ante bhavāḥ pratyekam aṅkurajanane samarthāḥ khaṇḍaśaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ kāryotpādābhāvād bhavadbhir iṣyanta iti kinna janayanti pratyekam? /
SA15arhebt_u:301_7: tataś caiṣām eka eva kaścid aṅkuraṃ janayati,
SA15arhebt_u:301_8: tadanye tu tatsvabhāvā api na janayantīti`tatsvabhāvasya jananāt' ity anekāntaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:301_9: tadvat kuśūlādyavasthā api bījādayo 'ṅkurādijananasvabhāvā api na janayiṣyantīti tair anekāntaḥ [S.
SA15arhebt_u:301_11: atrāha -- iti yad evaṃ tvaṃ manyase /
SA15arhebt_u:301_15: yadi hi na janayeyur jananasvabhāvā eva na syuḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:303_0: [ § 20. ekenaiva samarthyena kāryajanane pareṣām anupayogam āśaṅkya taduddhāraḥ /]
SA15arhebt_u:305_0: pratyekam antyānāṃ janakatve kāryasyaikena jananād apareṣām upayogasya nirviṣayatvād ajananam eveti manyamāna āha paraḥ -- teṣu antyeṣu sahakāriṣu saha -- yugapat karaṇaśīleṣu samarthasvabhāveṣu tatkāryakriyāyogyeṣu abhyupagamyamāneṣu satsu kāryasyaikenaiva janitatvāt ko 'parasyopayogaḥ? naiva kaścit /
SA15arhebt_u:305_2: etat pariharati -- `na vai' naiva bhāvānāṃ bījādīnāṃ kācit prekṣāpūrvakāritā buddhipūrvakāritā,
SA15arhebt_u:305_3: yataḥ prekṣāpūrvakāritvāt `ayam asmāsv anyatam eko 'pi samarthaḥ kāryajanane,
SA15arhebt_u:305_4: kim atrāsmābhiḥ karttavyam?' ity ālocya apare nivarteran [S.
SA15arhebt_u:305_6: yasmāt te bījādayo bhāvāḥ nirabhiprāyavyāpārāḥ paryālocanāśūnyavyāpārā ekata utpadyamāne kārye sarva eva vyāpriyante /
SA15arhebt_u:305_8: eva vyāpāraḥ / tadanyasyāyogāt[368]/ yadi hi vyāpṛtād anya eva vyāpāraḥ [T.
SA15arhebt_u:305_9: 268b.] tadā tata eva kāryotpādād vyāpāravataḥ kārakatvam eva hīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:305_10: tasyāsau vyāpāraḥ tatas tasya kārakatvam iti cet /
SA15arhebt_u:305_11: nanv evaṃ vyāpāropayogasya kāryānupayogini tatropacārāt[369]pāramārthikam asya kārakatvaṃ hīyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:305_13: samavāyaś cet / na / tasya prāg eva nirastatvāt / samavāyāc ca vyāpāravattve anyasyāpi[371]tatkāryānupayoginas[372]tadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ[373],
SA15arhebt_u:305_15: abhimatenaiva vyāpṛtena tadvyāpārotpādanāt nātiprasaṅgaḥ iti cet /
SA15arhebt_u:305_17: sa ca [S. 93b.] sarvatra samānaḥ / yena ca pariśrameṇa vyāpāraṃ janayati tena kāryam eva kin notpādayati? yena vyavadhānam āśrīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:305_18: yathā ca svasannidhimātreṇaivāyaṃ vyāpāraṃ janayati na vyāpārāntareṇa,
SA15arhebt_u:305_20: tasmād bhāvini kārye prāgbhāva eva kāraṇasya vyāpāraḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:305_21: sa ca sarveṣāṃ astīti sarva eva kāryotpattau vyāpriyanta iti vyapadiśyante /
SA15arhebt_u:305_22: tad api kāryaṃsarvebhya eva jāyate sarveṣāṃ bhāva eva tadbhāvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:305_23: na hi kāryasya kāraṇābhimatabhāva eva bhāvam antareṇāparaṃ janma /
SA15arhebt_u:305_24: tathābhāve[378]hi tatraiva kāraṇavyāpārāt kāryakriyaivaiṣāṃ na sambhavet /
SA15arhebt_u:305_25: tataś ca satsv api kāraṇeṣu katham asya bhāva upalabdhir vā syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:305_27: na / asatā {p. 91.1} tena[379]sambandhāyogāt / svata eva sattve vā [T. 269a.] janmārthānupapatteḥ / janmakāle copalabhyasyātmanaḥ[380]prāg[381]api bhāvāt tathopalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:305_28: rūpāntareṇa[382]bhāve na [S. 94a.] tasya bhāvaḥ syāt[383]/ rūpabhedalakṣaṇatvād bhāvabhedasya[384]/
SA15arhebt_u:305_31: tasmāt kāryam evābhūtvā hetubhāve bhavatīti bhāva evāsya[387]tato janmeti sarvebhyas tat jāyate /
SA15arhebt_u:305_32: nanv ekasyāpi tajjanane sāmarthyāt apareṣāṃ tatra sannidhilakṣaṇo vyāpāro vyartha eveti na tatrāpareṣāṃ bhāvaḥ saṅgacchata iti ced āha -- svahetoḥ kṣitibījasalilādisāmagrīlakṣaṇasya pariṇāmaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣavataḥ pratikṣaṇam upadhīyamānātiśayasya kṣaṇāntarasya prasavaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:305_33: tataḥ upanidhiḥ kāryadeśe sannidhānaṃ dharmo yeṣāṃ te tathābhavantaḥ kāryadeśe sannidhīyamānāḥ nopālambham arhanti -- `ekasyāpy etatkāryakaraṇe samarthatvāt kim atra bhavantaḥ sannihitāḥ?' iti na paryanuyogam arhanti /
SA15arhebt_u:305_36: 94b.] nirddeśaḥ / kṣitibījasalilādisāmagrīpariṇāmajanyasvabhāvatvād ekaikasya samarthasya tadbhāve[390]kutaḥ kevalasya sambhavaḥ[391]?,
SA15arhebt_u:305_40: etac ca yathāvasaraṃ tatra tatra vyaktīkariṣyati /
SA15arhebt_u:305_41: tasmād yatsāmagrījanyasvabhāvo yo bhāvaḥ sa tatraikābhāve 'pi kāraṇavaikalyān na sambhavatīty ekasāmagrījanmanāṃ sahabhāvo niyataḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:305_42: sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhāva eva kāryasya bhāvāt sarva eva janayantīti `tatsvabhāvasya jananāt' ity atra nānekāntaḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:305_43: {p. 92.1} yenābhiprāyeṇa `te 'ntyāḥ samarthāḥ kin na janayanti' ity uktaṃ taṃ prakaṭayann āha -- samarthāḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:305_44: siddhāntavādy api `janayanty eva' iti yadabhiprāyavatoktaṃ tam ādarśayati -- na,
SA15arhebt_u:305_45: tatraiva ityādi / etad eva vyācaṣṭe -- tasyaiva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:305_47: idam asamartham' iti pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanābhyām anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vyavahriyate,
SA15arhebt_u:305_48: anyanimittābhāvāt / tau cānvayavyatirekāv ekatraiva kārye dṛśyete nāparāparatreti tasyaivaikasya janane samarthā gamyanta iti nāparāparajananam /
SA15arhebt_u:305_49: te tu yadavasthā janayanto dṛśyante -- kiṃ tajjananasvabhāvās tadaiva? āhosvit prāg api? ity atra vivādaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:305_50: tatra prāg api tatsvabhāvatve paścād iva prāg api jananaprasaṅga iti pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda ucyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:311_1: 270a.] āhuḥ -- bhinnaḥ parasparavyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvo yeṣāṃ tebhyaś cakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ yugapatkartṛbhyaḥ ekasya vijñānalakṣaṇasya kāryasyotpattau satyām,
SA15arhebt_u:311_2: bahūni bhinnasvabhāvāni kāraṇāni kāryaṃ tv ekam abhinnasvabhāvam iti na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥsyāt /
SA15arhebt_u:311_3: tataś cakṣurādayo na bhinnenātmanaikasya kāryasya janakā eṣṭavyāḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:311_4: kintv abhinnam eṣām ekakāryajanakaṃ sāmānyabhūtaṃ rūpam upeyaṃ yenābhinnaṃ kāryaṃ janayanti /
SA15arhebt_u:311_5: tac ca samagrāvasthāyām eva tatkāryaṃ janayati na vyagrāvasthāyām /
SA15arhebt_u:311_7: sāmānyātmanaḥ [S. 95b.] kadācid abhāvavirodhāt / na ca tadā 'syā 'janakasvabhāvatā,
SA15arhebt_u:311_11: janakaṃ rūpaṃ tad ekaikābhāve 'pi vidyate na ca janayatīti `tatsvabhāvasya jananāt' ity anekānta iti /
SA15arhebt_u:314_0: siddhāntavādy āha -- na, yathāsvam ityādi / evaṃ manyate -- kiṃ punar idaṃ kāraṇam abhimataṃ bhavataḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:314_1: yadi pratyekaṃ cakṣurādikam; {p. 93.1} tad ayuktam / sāmagrījanyasvabhāvatvāt kāryasya,
SA15arhebt_u:314_2: tasyā eva kāraṇatvāt / nanu tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekam eva sāmagrīśabdavācyānāṃ jananasvabhāvatvābhyupagamāt pratyekam eva cakṣurādikaṃ kāraṇam /
SA15arhebt_u:314_3: [T. 270b.] yady evaṃ ko 'yaṃ niyamo yadanekasmād bhavatā 'nekena bhavitavyam viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvāt,
SA15arhebt_u:314_5: tadbhāve bhāvāt iti cet / anekatrāpi samānam etat / tad uktam -- tasyaivaikasya janane samarthāḥnānyasya iti nāparāparajananam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:314_7: yato nāsmākaṃ bhavatām iva kāraṇam eva [S.
SA15arhebt_u:314_8: 96a.] kāryātmatām upaiti, yato 'nekapariṇater anekarūpatvāt kāryasyānekatā syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:314_9: kintu apūrvam eva keṣucit satsu bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:314_10: tac cānekabhāva eva bhāvāt tatkāryam ucyate tasya kuto
SA15arhebt_u:314_11: 'nekatāprasaṅgaḥ? / yat tv abhinnaṃ rūpaṃ janakam ucyate tasyaikasthitāv api bhāvāt tatkāryajananasvabhāvāc ca tataḥ kāryaprasavaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:314_12: tadanyasannidhau tasya viśeṣābhāvāt tadāpi vā na janayet /
SA15arhebt_u:314_13: tasmād yeṣu bhāvābhāvavatsu kāryaṃ bhāvābhāvavad dṛśṭaṃ ta eva viśeṣā janakā iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:314_14: atha sāmagrīṃ kāraṇam āśrityocyate `na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syād iti',
SA15arhebt_u:314_15: {1}tan na, {2}yathāsvaṃ yasyāḥ sāmagryāḥ ya ātmīyaḥ svabhāvas tadbhedena tadviśeṣopayogataḥ tasya -- vijñānalakṣaṇasya kāryasya,
SA15arhebt_u:314_17: teṣūpayogataḥ [T. 271a.] tadupayogaiḥ bhinnasāmagrīvyāpāraiḥ kāryāḥ ye svabhāvaviśeṣāḥ -- kāryāṇāṃ viśiṣṭāḥ svabhāvāḥ [S.
SA15arhebt_u:314_19: sāmagrībhedād bhinnarūpataiva kāryāṇām iti kathan na kāraṇabhedād kāryabhedaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:314_26: bhinnasāmagrījanmanāṃ{p. 94.1} kāryasvabhāvaviśeṣāṇām asāṅkaryād asty eva sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhedāt kāryāṇāṃ bheda iti /
SA15arhebt_u:314_27: nanu yadā viṣayendriyamanaskārebhyo vijñānasambhavaḥ tadā teṣām upayogaviṣayasyaikatvāt katham asāṅkaryam? /
SA15arhebt_u:314_31: yadi tadbhedāt [S. 97a.] na bhidyate kāryam / kiṃ nu vai samagrāṇām anyānyakāryajananena janakatvam yatas tadbhāve tan na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:314_32: janakatvaṃ hy eṣāṃ tadbhāva eva kasyacid bhāvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:314_33: tatraikasyānekasya vā bhāve teṣām ekānekajanakatvam ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:320_0: nanv ekasyāḥ sāmagryā anekasya bhāve sāmagryantarajanyebhyo bhavatu bhedaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:320_1: parasparatas tu katham? / [T. 271b.] tadatadrūpahetujatvād dhi bhāvās tadatadrūpaṇi iṣyante /
SA15arhebt_u:320_2: tatra yadā cakṣūrūpamanaskārebhyo vijñānajanma tadā cakṣūrūpakṣaṇayor api bhāvād vijñānenābhinnahetujatvāt tayor vijñānātmatā,
SA15arhebt_u:320_3: vijñānasya vā tadrūpatā kathaṃ na prasajyeta? /
SA15arhebt_u:320_6: naiṣa doṣaḥ / teṣāṃ yathāsvaṃ svabhāvabhedena nimittopādānatayā tadupayogāt /
SA15arhebt_u:320_11: anyādṛśī ca vijñānader iti tadvailakṣaṇyād eva [S.
SA15arhebt_u:320_12: syād etat -- sarveṣāṃ anvayavyatirekāv anuvidhīyete tadā cakṣurādikṣaṇair iti kuto 'yaṃ bhedaḥ -- ihopādānabhāve bheda(-bhāveneda)m upayujyate,
SA15arhebt_u:320_15: tathā hi -- vijñānaṃ manaskārasya bodharūpatām anukaroti,
SA15arhebt_u:320_17: evam anyad api pratyeyam / niyamena ca vijñānamātrabhāve samanantarapratyayasya vyāpāro na cakṣurādeḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:320_19: 272a.] samanantarapratyayasya / evaṃrūpasyāpi vācyam / tasmād avasthābhede 'pi yad ekākāraparāmarṣa(śa)pratyayanibandhanatayā svasantatipatitakāryaprasūtinimittaṃ tad upādāna-kāraṇaṃ /
SA15arhebt_u:320_22: yayā kiñcit kāryaṃ svasantānavyavasthānibandhanaṃ janayanty aparaṃ ca santānāntaravyapadeśanibandhanam iti tasyā eva sāmagryā avāntaraviśeṣakṛtatvāc cakṣūrūpavijñānakṣaṇānāṃ parasparato [S.
SA15arhebt_u:326_0: tasmād yadi `kāraṇabhedāt' kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasya bhedaḥ anekatvaṃ tadā pratibandhābhāvād anekāntaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:326_1: na ca tadabhyupagamyata iti na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:326_2: atha sāmagrīlakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya bhedaḥ sāmagryantarād vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāryasyāpi bhedo 'tatkāraṇebhyo bhinnasvabhāvatocyate /
SA15arhebt_u:326_3: tadā[402]tasyeha[403]bhāvāt kathaṃ na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāt? iti abhiprāyavatā `na'[404]kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedo na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:326_5: ubhayaṃ[405]caitat kāryeṣu pramāṇaparidṛṣṭam iti darśayann āha -- yathā ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:326_6: mṛtpiṇḍādibhyo hi bhavato ghaṭasya na kāraṇānekatve 'py anekarūpatā /
SA15arhebt_u:326_8: tatra [T. 272b.] sāmagryantarajanyāt tāvad bhedaṃ darśayati -- mṛtpiṇḍāt ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:326_11: 98b.] yāni kāryāṇi sādhayanti tebhyo vilakṣaṇam eva samagrāṇi ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayanti /
SA15arhebt_u:326_12: tathā hi -- kulālādinirapekṣo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ tadanyajanyād vṛkṣāder vilakṣaṇam evopādānabhāvena mṛdātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:326_14: tatkāraṇāhitaviśeṣaś ca kevalamṛtpiṇḍād bhinnasvabhāvatayā tatkāryād apīṣṭakāder vilakṣaṇam eva karoti /
SA15arhebt_u:326_15: api tadanyopādānasahitaṃ sahakāribhāvena yatkāryam karoti tadvilakṣaṇam eva mṛtpiṇḍasahitaṃ tatkāranāhitaviśeṣaṃ ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti samudāyārthaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:326_16: tatra mṛtpiṇḍād bhinnaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭasya ye tadanyopādānakāraṇatayā mṛtsvabhāvā na bhavanti vṛkṣādayas tebhyo bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:326_17: kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍopādānāhitātiśayāt sahakāribhāvenopayujyamānāt tasyaiva ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍopādānatayā mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ pṛthubudhnodarādyākāraḥ tadātmatayā tadanyebhyo yeṣāṃ mṛtpiṇḍas tadanyanimittasahita [S.
SA15arhebt_u:326_18: 99a.] upādānam iṣṭakādīnāṃ tebhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:326_20: 273a.] tasyaiva ghaṭasya mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmano mṛtpiṇḍakulālayos tajjananasvabhāvatvāt ghaṭasya tadrūpayogāt tayośca[406]sūtrakāraṇopahitaviśeṣayos tannirapekṣāvasthāto
SA15arhebt_u:326_21: bhinnātmakatayā cakrāder vibhakto vicchinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati tasmād anu[krā]ntakāraṇatrayajanyo ghaṭaḥ tadanyasmād ekaikakāryād dvidvikāryāc ca bhinnasvabhāva eva jāyata iti sāmagrībhedād bhinnānyeva kāryāṇi parasparam asaṅkīrṇasvabhāvāni bhavantīti tadupayogakāryaviśeṣāsaṅkaraḥ[407]siddhaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:326_25: yata [S. 99b.] evaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhinnānyeveṣṭakācakrāvibhaktaghaṭa tadvibhaktaghaṭalakṣaṇāni kāryāṇi bhavanti tat tasmāt evam uktena prakāreṇa
SA15arhebt_u:326_26: kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍarahitād anyasāmagryantarbhūtāt na mṛtsvabhāvatā kasyacit kāryasya,

SA15arhebt_u:332_3: tābhyāṃ janito yo viśeṣo mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakaḥ sa eva tadanyasāmagrījanyād bhidyata iti bhedo asya /

SA15arhebt_u:417_33: {p. 127.1} kāryāpekṣayā 'pi virodhasya tādavasthyaṃ darśayann āha -- kāryaṃparam ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:417_34: kāryasya parāpekṣāṃ bruvan kevalāt kāraṇād anutpattim asya[527]kathayasi,
SA15arhebt_u:417_35: `sa kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ' itīdaṃ vadaṃs tataḥ kevalād utpattiṃ kāryasya brūṣe /
SA15arhebt_u:417_36: ete caikasyaiva kāryasya / tata evaikasmāt kāraṇād utpattyanutpattī parasparaviruddhe katham ekatra kāryākhye dharmiṇi syātām? viruddhadharmādhyāsasya bhedalakṣaṇatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:417_37: ekatra te bruvāṇo `mātā ca vandhyā ca' ity anena sadṛśaṃ brūṣa iti na [S.
SA15arhebt_u:417_38: 125b.] pūrvoktadoṣān mucyase, yata evam api bruvāṇo viruddham eva brūte na ca lakṣayati tat tasmāt ayam akṣaṇikavādī kṣaṇikapakṣasyānavadyatayā tadvādināṃ nirddoṣatāsampatsu amarṣalakṣaṇerṣyā eva śalyaṃ antarduḥkhahetutvāt tena vitudyamānāni vyathyamānāni marmāṇi yasya so yamīrṣyāśalyavitudyamānamarmā varāko 'svasthacittatayā viruddhābhidhānam
SA15arhebt_u:417_39: apy alakṣayan viklavam ākulaṃ pūrvāparāsambaddhaṃ vikrośati viroditi iti kṛtvā asvasthacittavacaneṣv anādarāt taddoṣodbhāvanasya sutarāṃ duḥkhotpādanena kṣatakṣāraniṣekatulyatvāt upekṣām eva vipaścitānāṃ(-ścitāṃ) kṛpādhanānām arhatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:417_40: tad evam akṣaṇikeṣu na kathañcid ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ [T.
SA15arhebt_u:417_41: 295a.] sambhavatīti pratipādyopasaṃhārann āha -- tasmād idam ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:417_42: yeṣāṃ hi sthirarūpatayā pṛthag api bhāvaḥ sambhavati teṣām akṣaṇikānāṃ pṛthak kevalānāṃ kāryakaraṇasambhavena hetunā sahaiva kurvantīti sahakāritvaniyamāyogād idam ekārthakriyālakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ [S.
SA15arhebt_u:417_43: 126a.] kṣaṇikānām eva / teṣāṃ svahetupariṇāmopanidhidharmāṇāṃ parasparopādānasahakāripratyayaikasāmagrījanyānāṃ pṛthag asambhavāt /
SA15arhebt_u:422_0: nanu atiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam api sahakāritvaṃ bhāveṣu dṛśyate tat katham uktaṃ prāk[528]`sarvatra naivātiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā,
SA15arhebt_u:422_1: kiṃ tarhi bahūnām ekārthakaraṇam eva' ity ata āha -- yatra tu santānopakāreṇa {p.
SA15arhebt_u:422_2: 128.1} ityādi / ekārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva sahakāritvaṃ sarvatra na kvacid atiśayotpādanaṃ sambhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:422_3: yatra tu santānopakāreṇa pūrvapūrvapratyayebhyo viśiṣṭaviśiṣṭatarottarottarakṣaṇajananena bhāvāḥ sahakāriṇo vivakṣitakāryasya hetutāṃ pratipadyante- yathā taṇḍulādibhya odanādijanmani dahanodakādayaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:422_4: bījādibhyaś cāṅkurādijanmani pṛthivyādayaḥ -- tatra viśeṣotpādane pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate loke /
SA15arhebt_u:422_6: 295b.] pūrvottarakṣaṇayor ekatvādhyavasāyena tasyaivāyam atiśaya iti na dravyāśrayeṇa /
SA15arhebt_u:422_8: / pūrvapūrvakṣaṇebhyas tu [S. 126b.] svahetupariṇāmopanidhidharmabhya uttarottaraviśeṣotpattau pūrvakāraṇakalāpasyaikārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva tatra paramārthataḥ sahakāritvam iti na kācit kṣatir iti /
SA15arhebt_u:422_11: yadi tarhi kṣaṇike taṇḍulādidravye viśeṣo notpadyate,
SA15arhebt_u:422_12: anantaram apy asau mā bhūt / tato yathā parasparato viśeṣamanāsādayanto 'pi kṣaṇikāḥ sahitā eva kurvanti na kevalāḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:422_13: evam akṣaṇikā api / tenaiṣām ekārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva sahakāritvaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA15arhebt_u:422_14: na ca śakyaṃ vaktum -- yo yasya prāg akārakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa paścād apīti /
SA15arhebt_u:422_15: tathā hi -- prabhāsvarād apavarakaṃ praviṣṭasyendriyam arthapratipattim akurvad api paścāt kurvāṇam upalabhyate /
SA15arhebt_u:422_19: ata āha -- na hi taṇḍulādīnām ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:422_22: [T. 296a.] tathā prabhāsvarād apavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo 'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyate tadā prāg iva paścād apy arthapratipattiṃ naiva janayet /
SA15arhebt_u:422_23: {p. 129.1} tasmād yad asambhavi kāryaṃ yatra dṛśyate tasya tato 'nyatvam eva,
SA15arhebt_u:422_24: śālibījād iva kodravabījasyeti niratiśayād anyatvam eva sātiśayatayā tatkāryakāriṇa iti /
SA15arhebt_u:422_25: evaṃ tāvad yatra sahakāribhyaḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ bhavati tatrātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam aupacārikaṃ sahakāritvam ekārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva tu mukhyaṃ tatrāpīti pratipāditam /
SA15arhebt_u:422_26: yatra tv akṣepeṇaivārthasannidhimātreṇa sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvanti kiṃ tatrāpi santānāśrayam atiśayotpādanam asti? ity ata āha -- akṣepakāriṣu ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:422_27: `ye hy avyavadhānādideśā indriyādayaḥ svahetubhyo jātās teṣv avilambitakāriṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:422_28: yadi na viśeṣotpattiḥ tadā kathaṃ nirviśeṣā jñānasya kāraṇī bhavanti? ity ata āha -- tatra yathāsvaṃ yasya ye ātmīyāḥ pratyayāḥ taiḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:422_29: parasparopasarppaṇavyavadhānādivirahāderāśrayabhūtair ye jātāḥ yogyaś cāsāv atyāsannatvātiviprakarṣavirahād deśaś ca sa ādir yasyāvyavahitadeśādeḥ tatrāvasthānam avasthā yeṣāṃ te saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā [T.
SA15arhebt_u:422_30: 296b.] svabhāvaniṣpattir vidyata[530]ity eva kṛtvā jṇānahetutāṃpratipadyante tatra kiṃ parasparato viśeṣotpattyā prārthitayā? /
SA15arhebt_u:422_31: yadi hi svahetubhya eva parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrebhyaḥ svakāryajananakṣamā yogyadeśādyavasthānalakṣaṇaviśeṣayogino notpadyeran,
SA15arhebt_u:422_33: na tu svahetubhya eva tathāvidhānām utpattau /
SA15arhebt_u:422_34: yata evam iti tasmāt tatra teṣu akṣepakāriṣv indriyādiṣu ekārthakriyaiva mukhyaṃ sahakāritvaṃ na santānāśrayeṇa
SA15arhebt_u:422_36: atha viśeṣotpādanalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ kathaṃ na vyavasthāpyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:422_37: tad api hi loke pratītatvād vyavasthāpanīyam evety ata āha -- yatra tu kārye nāvyavadhānādideśopanipātamātreṇaivendriyādaya iva sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayatāṃ pratipadyante,
SA15arhebt_u:422_38: kintu {p. 230.1} vivakṣitakāryotpādānuguṇaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ viśeṣam utpādayantaḥ tatra kālakṣepabhāvini kārye karttavye hetusantāno 'parāparakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇa ātmātiśayāsādanārthaṃ sahakārīṇi pratyayāntarāṇy apekṣate,
SA15arhebt_u:422_40: tatas tebhyaḥ kāraṇāntarebhyaḥ svabhāvāntarasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣaparamparālakṣaṇasya pratilabhyaḥ santānasyaikatvenādhimuktasyocyate loke /
SA15arhebt_u:422_41: paramārthas tu tatrāpi pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ pratyayakalāpa uttarottarakāryotpādānuguṇe [T.
SA15arhebt_u:422_42: 297a.] viśiṣṭakṣaṇe pratiniyata ity ekārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva sahakāritvam
SA15arhebt_u:422_45: yataḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ nirvarttayantīty ata āha -- tatra svarasataḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:422_46: tatra tasmin hetusantāne ye hetava upādānakāraṇākhyāḥ ye ca pratyayāḥ sahakārisaṃjñitās teṣāṃ ye pūrve [S.
SA15arhebt_u:422_47: 128b.] prathama upanipātakṣaṇāḥ teṣāṃ vināśahetvanapekṣitayā svarasato nivṛttau satyāṃ tebhya eva svarasato nivarttamānebhyaḥ prathamakṣaṇebhyaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇena viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭasya kṣaṇasyotpattiḥ tebhyo 'nuguṇataraviśeṣavatāṃ tṛtīyakṣaṇānāṃ tebhyonuguṇatamaviśeṣavatāṃ caturthakṣaṇānām;
SA15arhebt_u:422_48: evaṃ yāvad atyantātiśayavānantyaḥ kāraṇakalāpo jātaḥ tataḥ kāryasyotpattiḥ ity evaṃ sahakāribhyaḥ svabhāvāntarapratilambhaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:422_50: atra paraś codayann āha -- sahakāriṇaḥ saha karaṇaśīlāt kāraṇāt,
SA15arhebt_u:422_51: jātāv ekavacanam, yat samutpannaviśeṣam anantaroktena prakāreṇa kāraṇaṃ antyasāmagrīkṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ tato 'ṅkurādikāryotpattau iṣyamāṇāyāṃ tasyaiva viśeṣasyādyasya kāryotpādanānuguṇasya yaḥ krameṇābhivarddhamānaḥ kāryasya janaka iṣyate tasyaiva utpattir na syāt prathamakṣaṇopanipātināṃ [T.
SA15arhebt_u:422_52: 297b.] parasparato viśeṣānāsādanāt kṣaṇānām avivekāt anabhyupagamāc ca /
SA15arhebt_u:422_53: parasparato 'navāptaviśeṣā eva kāryotpādanānuguṇaṃ viśeṣam ārapsyanta iti ced āha -- aviśiṣṭād aviśiṣṭebhyaḥ parasparato {p.
SA15arhebt_u:422_54: 131.1} viśeṣasya kāryotpādānuguṇasyotpattāv iṣyamāṇāyāṃ kāryasya aṅkurādeḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:422_56: tataś ca parasparato viśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ [S.
SA15arhebt_u:422_57: kim evaṃ sati siddhaṃ bhavati? iti cet,
SA15arhebt_u:422_58: āha -- tena yena kṣaṇikā api parasparato viśeṣotpādā 'napekṣā eva svakāryaṃ kurvanti ekakāryapratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ ca sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyante tena kāraṇena akṣaṇikānām api kāraṇatāsyāt,
SA15arhebt_u:422_59: apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥsvabhāvātiśayotpattiśca na syāt ity akṣaṇikavādī kṣaṇikapakṣeṇa[531]svapakṣasya sāmyamāpādayati /
SA15arhebt_u:426_4: iti / tatraitat syāt prathamakṣaṇe 'pi kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparataḥ samutpannaviśeṣā eva sannidhīyante --
SA15arhebt_u:426_6: iti nyāyād dhi dūradeśavarttinām api hetuphalabhāvāt ity āśaṅkyāha -- atha sahakāriṇā ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:426_7: sahakāriṇaḥ [T. 298a.] parasparasamparkkavikalā api vastudharmatayaivānyonyam upakurvantīti sahakāriṇā kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajananāya kṛtaviśeṣa eva samparkkakāla upatiṣṭheta,
SA15arhebt_u:426_8: evaṃ [S. 129b.] saty anavasthā syāt / tathā hi -- tadviśeṣotpattāv apy aparaḥ sahakārikṛto viśeṣo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:426_10: atha naivaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣanimittam aparaṃ viśeṣaṃ kurvanti,
SA15arhebt_u:426_11: svabhāvata eva tatra teṣāṃ yogyatvāt ity ata āha -- na ca ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:426_12: naiva hi sahakāriṇaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇo yo viśeṣaḥ tadutpādane nityaṃ sarvakālaṃ yogyāvasthā yena yogyāvasthatvena nityānuśaktaḥ nityānubaddhaḥ eṣāṃ kṣitibījādīnāṃ {p.
SA15arhebt_u:426_13: 132.1} kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanako viśeṣaḥ syāt yataḥ `aviśiṣtād viśeṣotpattau kāryasyāpi syāt' ity etad api parihriyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:426_14: kuta etad? ity āha -- tadupāya ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:426_15: teṣāṃ kṣitibījādīnām upāye -- yogyadeśopanipāte kāryavyaktidarśanāt[532]apāye ca -- parasparasamparkkavirāme kāryānutpattidarśanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:426_16: yadi hi kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane sarvadā yogyāvasthāḥ syuḥ tadā so 'pi viśeṣaḥ sarvadā [T.
SA15arhebt_u:426_17: 298b.] syāt / tatas tatparamparābhāvi kāryam iti tadupāyāpāyayoḥ kāryasyotpattyanutpattī na syātām /
SA15arhebt_u:426_18: [S. 130a.] tasmān na sahakāriṇaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane yogyāvasthāḥ sarvadeti /
SA15arhebt_u:426_19: yataḥ sahakāriṇā pṛthagavasthitenānavasthābhayāt kṛtaviśeṣo nopatiṣṭhate parasparataś ca prathamasamparkkakṣaṇabhāvināṃ nopeyate[533]yujyate vā /
SA15arhebt_u:426_20: tena kāraṇenādyo viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ samānakālatayā nirupakārasya kṣitibījādeḥ notpadyate[534],
SA15arhebt_u:426_21: utpadyate cāsau itīṣyate / tena samagrāvasthāvat sarveṣāṃ vyagrāvasthābhāvinām api kṣaṇānām aviśeṣāt
SA15arhebt_u:426_23: yathā kṣaṇikānām ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ tathā sthirasvabhāvānām api bhaviṣyatīti kṣīṇasarvopāyo 'kṣaṇikavādī sāmyam evātura iva bahumanyamānas tatraiva bharaṃ[535]kṛtavān /
SA15arhebt_u:426_24: siddhāntavādī bhaṅgyā param upahasann āha -- nāsmākaṃpunaḥpunaḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:426_25: yadi punaḥ punar vacane 'pi lokasya nyāyapratītir bhavati śataśo 'pi brūmaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:426_26: kim aṅga punar dvau trīn vā vārān? /
SA15arhebt_u:426_27: na hi parārthapravṛttānām asmākaṃ punaḥ punar abhidhāne kaścid udvego bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:426_28: evaṃ vādinaś ca śāstrakṛtaḥ kvacit prakārāntareṇa[536]tam evārthaṃ [T.
SA15arhebt_u:426_29: 299a.] sphuṭīkurvato ye punaruktāparihārāya yat ante sa teṣām asthānapariśrama eva /
SA15arhebt_u:426_30: yadi nodvego hanta tarhy ucyatām ity ata āha -- na viśeṣotpādanād eva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:426_31: naiva viśeṣotpādanāt {p. 133.1} sahakāriṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ paramārthataḥ kvacit [S.
SA15arhebt_u:426_32: 130b.] sambhavati, yataḥ prathamakṣaṇabhāvināṃ bījādīnāṃ tadabhāvāt kāryotpādānuguṇe viśeṣe karttavye sahakāritāvirahaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:426_33: kintv ekārthakriyaiva sahakāriṇāṃ pāramārthikaṃ sahakāritvaṃ pūrvoktābhir yuktibhiḥ sambhāvyate /
SA15arhebt_u:426_36: para āha -- sā 'py ekārthakriyā na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām /
SA15arhebt_u:426_37: yadi punaḥ parasparato viśeṣarahitānām api tadekārthakriyā 'ṅgīkriyate tadā pratyekaṃ tadavasthāyāṃ tadutpādanasāmarthyābhyupagamāt tadavasthāyām iva pṛthag api sā bhavet /
SA15arhebt_u:426_38: tathā hi -- te tadavasthāyām api parasparato nirviśeṣā eva kurvanti /
SA15arhebt_u:426_39: teṣāṃ pṛthag api tadviśeṣakriyā katham iva na prasajyeta? /
SA15arhebt_u:426_40: na hy eṣāṃ saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayoḥ kaścid viśeṣo 'stīti /
SA15arhebt_u:426_41: bhavatu, ko doṣaḥ? iti cet; tathāca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣasya pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge sati tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlam aṅkurādi kāryam api viśeṣavat kevalāt sahakāriṇaḥ syāt iti cen manyase,
SA15arhebt_u:426_43: tathā hi -- saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayor nirviśeṣā eva kṣaṇakṣayiṇo bhāvā iti taducyate tat kiṃ tāvad viśeṣamātrāpekṣayā? āhosvit [T.
SA15arhebt_u:426_48: na hi kadācit kiṃcid ekam eva,
SA15arhebt_u:426_50: na ca tabhāve 'pi tat tādṛśam eva,
SA15arhebt_u:426_51: kāraṇabhedāt / etāvat tu syāt -- kaścid viśeṣaḥ kvacit kārye 'nuguṇo na sarvaḥ sarvatreti /
SA15arhebt_u:426_52: etac ca prāg evoktam iti darśayann āha -- pratikṣaṇam aparāparaiḥpratyayaiḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:426_53: `aparāparapratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yady api kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpāḥ pratīyante,
SA15arhebt_u:426_56: `kṣaṇikeṣu {p.134.1} bhāveṣv aparāparotpatter aikyābhāvāt'[538]iti cātra saṃkṣiptataram uktam /
SA15arhebt_u:426_57: evaṃ ca `nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punar vacana' ity atra dviḥ punargrahaṇaṃ yujyate /
SA15arhebt_u:426_58: yathā yena prakāreṇa bhāvasantāneviśeṣasyotpattiḥ [ta]d apy uktam
SA15arhebt_u:426_59: -- `tatra svarasataḥ pūrvakṣaṇanirodhe tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpādād viśeṣotpattiḥ'[539]iti /
SA15arhebt_u:426_60: atha kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakaviśeṣāpekṣayā prāgvat prathamasamparkkabhājaḥ parasparato nirviśeṣā ity abhimataṃ tad apy ayuktam /
SA15arhebt_u:426_64: tadbhāva eva tasya bhāvāt etāvanmātranibandhanatvāc ca 4janakaṃ vya(-kavya)vasthāyāḥ[540]/
SA15arhebt_u:426_65: te ca tathāvidhāḥ sarvadā na bhavantī kathaṃ pṛthag api kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambha eṣāṃ syāt?,
SA15arhebt_u:426_66: yataḥ kevalānām api kāryakriyā prasajyeta tad darśayati -- yogyo deśo yeṣāṃ te yogyadeśāḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:426_67: tadbhāvo yogyadeśatā, sā ādir yeṣāṃ avyavahitadeśatvādīnām avasthābhedānāṃ te tathoktāḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:426_68: te ca te avasthābhedāś ca tathoktāḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:426_71: naivaṃvidhāḥ sarvadā bījādaya iti katham eṣāṃ pṛthag api tathāvidhaviśeṣārambhaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:426_72: etad api prāg evoktam `tatra yo 'vyavadhānādideśo rūpendriyādikalāpaḥ sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ'[541]iti vacanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:426_73: tasya codāharaṇamātratvāt / ihāpi tatra yo 'vyavadhānādideśaḥ kṣitibījādikalāpaḥ sa kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanane samartho hetur iti pratīyata eva /
SA15arhebt_u:426_74: sa ca [S. 132a.] tathāvidho viśeṣaḥ sarvadā na bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:426_77: etad api pūrvam evoktam ity āha -- teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣa[janane] viśeṣavatāṃ yata utpattis tad apy uktam asakṛd eva `yas teṣāṃ parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣaḥ sa taddhetujanane samartho hetuḥ'[542]iti /
SA15arhebt_u:426_79: ye {p. 135.1} yogyadeśādyavasthā jātās te saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyanta'[543]ity anena,
SA15arhebt_u:426_80: ihāpi gamyamānatvāt / tato yady apy eṣāṃ parasparato 'nupapatter[544]viśeṣo na bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:426_82: na ca svahetuta eva sañjātaviśeṣāṇāṃ bhāve parasparatas tadāśaṃsā,
SA15arhebt_u:426_84: teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthye 'pi khaṇḍaśaḥ kāryotpādāyogāt sakalasyaiva pratyekaṃ karaṇāt /
SA15arhebt_u:426_85: yathā kevalānām akriyā kartṛviśeṣasyāvyavadhānādideśakṣitibījādikalāpasya pṛthag ekaikasya samarthasya bhāvasyābhāvād ity etad apy asakṛdevoktam `teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścāt na pṛthagbhāva iti samarthānāpi [S.
SA15arhebt_u:426_88: aprasaṅgāt kutaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambhadvārakaṃ kāryam api syād iti? /
SA15arhebt_u:426_89: kutaḥ punar ayaṃ kāmacāro labhyate yadaṅkurādikāryaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇāṃ viśeṣaparamparāṃ janayantaḥ kurvanti,
SA15arhebt_u:426_90: kāryotpādānuguṇaṃ tu viśeṣaṃ vyavadhānādirahitadeśopanipātamātreṇety[546]ata āha -- kāryadvaividhyaṃca yasmāt tasmād evaṃvibhajyate /
SA15arhebt_u:426_91: kathaṃ dvaividhyaṃ kāryāṇām iti? ata āha -- sahakāribhir avyavadhānādideśair anantaraṃ sañjanitāḥ parasparasya prāgavasthāpekṣaviśiṣṭakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇā ye viśeṣās tatparamparayā uttarottaraviśiṣṭaviśiṣṭatarādikṣaṇabhāvarūpayā utpattir ddharmo yasya tadātmakam ekaṃ kāryam /
SA15arhebt_u:426_92: anyac ca tadviparītaṃ yat sahakārisannidhimātreṇa bhavati na parasparakṛtāṃ viśeṣaparamparām apekṣate /
SA15arhebt_u:426_96: caitad viśeṣaṇam / kuta etad? iti cet {p. 136.1} kāryakāraṇayoḥ svabhāvabhedāt /
SA15arhebt_u:426_99: kāraṇam api kiñcit [T. 301b.] svasannidhimātreṇa kāryajananasvabhāvaṃ svakāraṇebhya eva bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:426_103: tadviparītaṃ cāparam / śālyaṅkuraś ca tadbījajanyasvabhāvo na yavādibījajanyasvabhāva iti na bhāvānāṃ svahetubalāyātāḥ pramāṇādhigatāḥ svābhāvāḥ paryanuyojyāḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:426_104: ye tu yajjananasvabhāvāḥ pramāṇato 'dhigatāḥ te kiṃ sarvadaiva tatsvabhāvāḥ? āhosvit tadaiva? ity atra cintā pravarttate /
SA15arhebt_u:426_105: tatra sarvadā tatsvabhāvatve paścād iva prāg api tatkāryakriyāprasaṅgena pararūpeṇākārakasya [S.
SA15arhebt_u:426_107: ucyate / sadṛśāparabhāvanibandhanaṃ caikatayā pratyabhijñānaṃ lūnapunarjāteṣv iva keśanakhādiṣu 6ity atra[548]virodhābhāvād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:426_109: tatraitasmiṃ(smin) sati sahakāribhyaḥ kṣitibījādibhyas teṣāṃ parasparasantānopakāram apekṣate yat kāraṇam antyavasthāprāptaṃ tasya yat kāryam aṅkurādikaṃ tajjanmanimittaṃ sahakāriṇāṃ prathamakṣaṇānantaraṃ viśiṣṭadvitīyakṣaṇabhāvarūpo yo [T.
SA15arhebt_u:426_110: 302a.] viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ ādyo bhavati sa teṣāṃ sahakāriṇāṃ prathamasamparkkabhājāṃ parasparakṛto yo viśeṣas tajjanmā na bhavati parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayād eva pratyayaviśeṣāt tasya bhāvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:426_111: tataḥ kāryotpādānuguṇād ādyād viśeṣāt prathamakṣaṇopanipātibhiḥ sahakāribhir anyataḥ [S.
SA15arhebt_u:426_114: kutaḥ? tatprakṛtitvāt tasyādyasya viśeṣasya parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayāt pratyayaviśeṣād āsāditatadanukūlaviśeṣaiḥ sahakāribhiḥ parasparopakāranirapekṣair janyasvabhāvatvāt,
SA15arhebt_u:426_118: atha sahakāriṇā kṣityādinā kuśūlādyavastho 'pi bījādiḥ tenāpi kṣityādiḥ kṛtaviśeṣa evopatiṣthetānavasthaivaṃsyāt iti /
SA15arhebt_u:426_121: tatra yad uktaṃ pareṇa `yathā prathamasamparttabhājaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya viśeṣamanād
SA15arhebt_u:426_123: tathā [S. 134b.] sthirarūpā api bhāvāḥ tadekakāryapratiniyatāḥ parasparakṛtaviśeṣanirapekṣā eva bhāviṣyanti' iti,
SA15arhebt_u:426_125: kṣaṇikavad akṣaṇiko 'pi yadi kāryaṃ karoti karotu nāma /
SA15arhebt_u:426_126: na kaścid vārayati / kintu yena svabhāvena kāryaṃ karoti sa yadi avilambitakāryakartṛdharmā apekṣeṇa karotīty evaṃśīlo dharmo yasya sa tathoktaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:426_127: tadā pṛthagbhāvasya sambhavāt kevalo 'pi na kevalaṃ sahitaḥ tathāsyāt tatkāryakārakaḥ syād ity uktaṃ bahuśaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:426_128: atatsvabhāvas tu akṣepakartṛsvabhāvavikalas tu tadā'pi sahitāvasthāyām api prāgvat akāraka eva pararūpeṇa kartṛtvasya pūrvam eva niṣedhāt /
SA15arhebt_u:426_129: tad evam ekārthakriyayā viśeṣotpādanena cākṣaṇikānāṃ sahakāritvaṃ niṣidhyopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:426_131: 303a.] sahakārīti kevalo 'pi svakāryaṃ kuryād iti sahakāripratyayāpekṣasyākṣaṇikasya hetutāṃ bruvāṇasya kiṃ yuktam iti [S.
SA15arhebt_u:426_133: yo hi sthirahetuvādī tasya yadi sa hetuḥ pratyayāntarāṇy apekṣya kāryaṃ karoti tadā vyaktam avaśyaṃ tasya sthirasya hetoḥ pratyayāntarāpekṣakārakasya svabhāvāntarasyotpattir iti /
SA15arhebt_u:426_135: yataḥ sahakāriṇāṃ yaḥ saṃghātaḥ sannipātaḥ tatsthāyī tatra varttamāno bhāvasantānaḥ prāyaḥ bāhulyena sahakāripratyayair upajanitaviśeṣaḥ san svakāryaṃkurvan dṛṣṭo {p.
SA15arhebt_u:426_138: tatsambhavino nyāyasyākṣaṇikeṣu pṛthagbhāvasambhavena kathañcid api kalpayitum aśakyatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:426_139: prāgakārakasya paścāt kārakasvabhāvāntarotpattis tu na virudhyate /
SA15arhebt_u:426_140: tasyaiva hy akārakasya tadātmā kārakaḥ svabhāvo na yujyate na tv atadātmā /
SA15arhebt_u:426_143: atha matam -- kārakasvabhāvāntarotpattir iṣyate yadi sthirasya hetoḥ prāg api kārakasvabhāvo [S.
SA15arhebt_u:426_144: 135b.] na syāt / tasya tu prāg api bhāvāt pratyayāntarāpekṣā tadutpattir apy ukteti ata āha -- kārakasya ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:426_145: yadi hi samagrāvasthāyāḥ prāg api kārakasvabhāvo bhavet tadā 'syākriyā na yujyate,
SA15arhebt_u:426_148: na ca karoti / tasmāt so 'sya svabhāvaḥ prāṅ naivāsīt /
SA15arhebt_u:426_149: yadi ca pratyayāntarair apy asau na kriyeta tat 2kim iti mudhaiva tāny apekṣate?[550]iti /
SA15arhebt_u:431_0: tad evaṃ `tatsvabhāvasya jananāt'[551]ity asya `yo yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetor evotpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati na punas tadbhāve hetvantaram apekṣate'[552]ity asyānekāntaparihārāyoktasya prakārāntareṇānekānte udbhāvite tatparijihīrṣayā aparāparapratyayayogena[553]ity ādy abhihitam /
SA15arhebt_u:431_1: tatra yena nyāyena kṣaṇikānāṃ hetuphalasvabhāvaḥ tasyākṣaṇikeṣv asambhavaṃ pratipādayituṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ yad upakrāntaṃ tat parisamāpayya prakṛtam anubadhnann āha -- tasmād yo yadātmā ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:431_3: 136a.] na nāśakāraṇaiḥ prayojanaṃ svabhāvena sthitidharmaṇo bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- sthitidharmaṇo 'pi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:431_4: sthitidharmaṇo 'pi hi naiva nāśakāraṇaiḥ kiñcit prayojanam /
SA15arhebt_u:431_5: tasya svahetubhyaḥ samupajāto yaḥ sthiraḥ svabhāvaḥ {p.
SA15arhebt_u:431_7: kāmaṃ hi bhāvāḥ svayaṃ na bhaveyuḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:431_8: tu santa eva svaṃ svabhāvaṃ parityajanti /
SA15arhebt_u:431_9: atha sthitidharmaṇo 'py anyathātvapratipattir iṣyate tadā 'nyathātvapratipattau vā tatsvabhāva eva sthitidharmaiva na syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:431_10: ātmabhūtasyāsthitidharmaṇaḥ svabhāvasya paścāt sambhave prāg apy abhāvaāyogāt /
SA15arhebt_u:431_11: na hi tadātamanas tasmiṃ(smin) sannihite kadācidabhāvo yuktaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:431_13: tathā ca sati pūrva eva vikalpaḥ svabhāvenāsthitidharmā bhāva iti /
SA15arhebt_u:431_14: tatra ca pūrvavikalpe prāg evoktaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vināśahetor vaiyarthyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:431_15: athāsau sthirasvabhāva eva, kevalam asyāsthirasvabhāvatā prāg asati vināśahetor upajāyate,
SA15arhebt_u:431_16: anyathā nivṛttyayogād ity ata āha -- yaśca parasmāt nāśahetoḥ sthitidharmaṇaḥ [S.
SA15arhebt_u:431_18: sa pūrvakāt sthitidharmaṇaḥ svahetusamudbhūtāt svabhāvāt aparaḥ anyaḥ svabhāvas tasmin niṣpanne paścā[j janya]tvād bhinnahetukatvāc ca kathaṃtasya svabhāvaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:431_20: sārūpyād alakṣitavivekasya tathā pratibhāsanaṃ syāt yady asau [T.
SA15arhebt_u:431_24: yaś cāparaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ tasya? /
SA15arhebt_u:431_26: atiprasaṅgāt / yo 'paraḥ svabhāvaḥ sa kim iti tasya na bhavati? ity ata āha -- svabhāvabheda- ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:431_27: bhavatu vastvantaram eva tadaparasvabhāvatayā ko doṣaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:431_28: ity ata āha -- tathāca vastvantaratve sati vināśahetor upajāyamānasya svabhāvasya pūrvako bhāvaḥ svahetubhyo yaḥ sthitidharmā [S.
SA15arhebt_u:431_29: 137a.] jātaḥ so 'cyutidharme sthito nivṛttibhāṅ na bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:431_30: vināśahetor vastvantarotpattau vyāpṛtatvād iti na tasya sthitidharmaṇo 'nyathābhāvo nivṛttiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:431_31: na hi mudgarāder vastvantarasya bhāve 'parasya nivṛttir yuktā,
SA15arhebt_u:431_32: atiprasaṅgāt / tadupamarddena tadutpattau ca prāg eva proktam /
SA15arhebt_u:431_33: {p. 140.1} nanu ca dṛśyata eva kaṭhinādirūpasya tāmrāder agnyāder vināśahetor dravādisvabhāvāntarotpattiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:431_34: na ca pūrvakasya pracyutidharmatā ity ata āha -- etena anantaroktena kaṭhinādīnām ādiśabdād 2dravādīnāṃ tāmrasuvarṇādīnām[554]agniśītavātādibhyo dravatvakaṭhinatvādisvabhāvāntarotpattir vyavasthitarūpasya tāmrādeḥ pratyuktā pratyākhyātā,
SA15arhebt_u:431_35: kathaṃ tarhi svabhāvāntarotpattiḥ pūrvasya cāpracyutidharme sthitasyābhāvo [T.
SA15arhebt_u:431_36: 305a.] yuktaḥ? ity āha -- tatrāpi kaṭhinādirūpe tāmrādau pūrvakasya kaṭhinadravādirūpasya svarasanirodhitvāt vināśahetvayogena /
SA15arhebt_u:431_38: sahakāriṇaḥ parasparopasarppaṇādyāśraya pratyayaviśeṣopajātātiśayād upādānāc ca yat tat kaṭhinādirūpaṃ tāmrādi svarasato virudhyate /
SA15arhebt_u:431_39: tata eva upādānakāraṇād agnyādisahakārikāraṇopādānapratyayopajātaviśeṣād apara eva anya eva dravakaṭhinādisvabhāvo dravagrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇatvāt,
SA15arhebt_u:431_40: [S. 137b.] utpanno na tu pūrvakam eva kaṭhinadravādirūpaṃ tāmrādi vyavasthitātmakaṃ dravakaṭhinādisvabhāvena pariṇatam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:431_41: atra para āha -- kenoktaṃ yathā `sthitidharmaṇaḥ sato 3vināśahetor asthitisvabhāvotpattis[555]tato vināśaḥ' iti,
SA15arhebt_u:431_42: yena `yaś ca parasmād anyathābhāvaḥ so 'paraḥ svabhāvaḥ' ityādy ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:431_43: kintu sa svayaṃ sthitidharmaiva svahetubhir janito nāsyāsthirasvabhāvatā vināśahetor upajāyate /
SA15arhebt_u:431_47: yadi svabhāvenāsthitidharmā svahetor jātaḥ syāt tadā tadasambhave 'pi nāvatiṣṭheta /
SA15arhebt_u:431_48: tasya svabhāvena sthitidharmaṇaḥ svahetubhir evāyam aparaḥ svabhāvo niyamito yaduta parasmāt virodhino 'gnyāder vināśaḥsvayaṃbhavatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:431_49: parasmād iti karmaṇi lyaplope pañcamī paramapekṣya ity arthaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:431_50: svahetubhir evāyaṃ {141.1} niyamitasvabhāvo jāto yathā tvayā virodhinam apekṣya svayaṃ nirva(va)rttitavyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:431_53: nanu yady asya vināśo virodhisannidhāne svayam eva bhavaty ahetukaḥ prāpnoti,
SA15arhebt_u:431_54: ahetoś ca deśakālasvabhāvaniyamo na yukta ity ata āha -- na ca naiva vināśo nāma vinaṃṣṭur aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:431_55: yato 'yaṃ doṣaḥ syāt, kintu bhāvacyutir eva vināśaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:431_56: [S. 138a.] tasyāś ca niḥsvabhāvatvād dhetumattā naiva yujyate /
SA15arhebt_u:431_57: na hi sā tasya bhavati / kevalam asau svayam eva na bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:431_60: kīdṛśaṃ vikalpadvayam? / `kiṃ nityo bhāvaḥ?' ityādi / [T. 306a.] nanu ca kālāntarasthitidharmatām upagacchato naiva nityavikalpasyāvakāśaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:431_62: tathā hi -- yady ayaṃ saṃvatsarasthitidharmā svahetubhir janitas tadā saṃvatsaraparisamāptau yo 'syādāv udayakāle saṃvatsarasthitidharmā svabhāvo yato 'yaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ sthitaḥ sa eva tadante 'pi /
SA15arhebt_u:431_64: tadante 'pi prathamotpannasaṃvatsarasthitidharmasvabhāvāparityāgād aparāparasaṃvatsarasthitiprasaṅgāt kālāntarasthitidharmatopagame 'pi nityataivopagatā bhavatīti nityavikalpo durnnivāraḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:431_65: vināśahetusannidhau svayaṃ nivarttata iti copagamād anityavikalpo naśvarātmatāvikalpaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:431_66: tathā hi -- vināśahetvabhimatasannidhau svayaṃ vinaśyato yo 'sya svabhāva sa eva bhāvasyaikarūpatvād utpannamātrasyeti tadaiva vināśaprasaṅgāt katham asya
SA15arhebt_u:431_68: evaṃ vikalpe kṛte pāścātyavikalpopagame kālāntarasthitir evāsya truṭyatīti nityavikalpa evānenopagantavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:431_69: tatra [S. 138b.] vināśahetusannidhau svayaṃ nāśopagame prāṅ nityo bhūtvā paścād anityo [T.
SA15arhebt_u:431_72: vakṣyamāṇāpekṣaś cakāraḥ / {p. 142.1} kīdṛśaṃ bhāvadvayam? / nityānityau svabhāvau bhedau yasya tathā /
SA15arhebt_u:431_73: yo 'sau nityaḥ svabhāvaḥ prāktanaḥ tasya nityābhimatasya svayaṃ paścān nāśaṃ bruvāṇaḥ sarvadā pratikṣaṇam eva nāśaṃ prāha /
SA15arhebt_u:431_74: anyathā pūrvoktena nyāyena paścād api nāśāsambhavāt /
SA15arhebt_u:431_75: atha pratikṣaṇam asya nāśo na bhavati tadā paścād api tadayogāt sarvadaivānāśaṃ prāheti kṛtvā pūrvasminn ity ābhimate svabhāve vināśahetur asamartho 'kiñcitkara eva /
SA15arhebt_u:431_76: nanu ca vināśahetor naiva sāmarthyam upagataṃ pareṇa virodhisannidhim apekṣya svayaṃ nāśopagamāt /
SA15arhebt_u:431_78: anyathā hy akiñcitkaraḥ kim ity asāv apekṣyate?,
SA15arhebt_u:431_80: svahetava evātrāparādhyanti yadakiñcitkare 'pi tatrāpekṣāyāṃ niyuñjata iti cet /
SA15arhebt_u:431_81: kaḥ punar ayam asthānābhiniveśaḥ teṣāṃ yat tatra tathā niyuñjate /
SA15arhebt_u:431_85: na hy asyāvirodhitvābhimatād[559]viśeṣaḥ kaścid iti yatkiñcid etat /

SA15arhebt_u:488_165: yad uktaṃ `jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇayā svabhāvānupalabdhyā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate nābhāvaḥ`[652]iti tat paro vighaṭayituṃ,
SA15arhebt_u:488_167: tasya sādhanāsiddheḥ`[653]iti dvitīye vyākhyāne[654]pratiṣedhamātrasyānupalabdhi[r i]ty 4etasya sādhanaṃ[655]darśayitum āha -- anyabhāvalakṣaṇa ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:488_168: evaṃ manyate -- loko hi kevalapradeśadarśanāt ghaṭābhāvam eva prathamaṃ pratipadyate kevalapradeśajñānasaṃvedanadvāreṇa ghaṭajñānābhāvapratipattyā vā tato ghaṭābhāvasya vyavahāram /
SA15arhebt_u:488_169: tena lokapratītyanusāreṇa pratiṣedhyād anyasya pradeśasya pratiṣedhyajñānād vā tajjñānasya yo bhāvas tallakṣaṇo 'bhāvaḥ svayaṃ pramāṇenendriyapratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇa ca siddho 'laṃ [S.
SA15arhebt_u:488_170: 169a.] ghaṭābhāvaṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca yathākramaṃ sādhayitum,
SA15arhebt_u:488_171: sa ca ghaṭābhāvavyavahāram ity evaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ
SA15arhebt_u:488_172: yuktam / na caivam api vyavasthāpane [asma]tpakṣasya kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_173: tathā hi -- pāramparyeṇāpi yad anupalabdheḥ tvadabhyupagatāyāḥ siddhaṃ tat tat eva siddhaṃ bhavatīti [T.
SA15arhebt_u:488_175: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yathā bhavato jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā bhāvarūpā dvividhā 'nupalabdhis tathā mamāpi jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvo 'py anupalabdhisaṃjñito dvividho bhaviṣyati /
SA15arhebt_u:488_176: tatra jñeyadharmalakṣaṇenānyabhāvena pratyakṣasiddhena pratiṣedhyābhāvo jñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvarūpa 'nupalabdhisaṃjñitaḥ setsyati /
SA15arhebt_u:488_177: jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇena cānyabhāvena kevalapradeśajñānātmanā svasaṃvedanasiddhena jñātṛdharmaḥ pratiṣedhyajñānābhāvarūpo 'nupalabdhisamākhyātaḥ setsyati /
SA15arhebt_u:488_178: tataś ca kuto 'navasthā yena sādhanāsiddhiḥ syād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_179: tatra[656]anyabhāvalakṣaṇa iti pratiṣedhyāt tajjñānāc ca yo 'nyo bhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktaḥ pradeśaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:488_180: tajjñānaṃ ca tadātmako 'bhāvaḥ vivakṣitād bhāvāt pratiṣedhyād bhāvāt tajjñānāc cānyatvād {p.
SA15arhebt_u:488_181: 178.1} anupalabdhitvena bhavato 'bhimataḥ svayaṃ svarūpeṇa pramāṇenendriyapratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇa ca siddhaḥ saṃs tasya [S.
SA15arhebt_u:488_182: 169b.] pratiṣedhyasyābhāvavyavahāraṃ jñānābhidhānapravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ sādhayet tatsiddhisiddho vā tasyānyabhāvalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya yathoktasya siddhyā siddho vā tadabhāvas tasya pratiṣedhyasya tajjñānasya[657]vā 'bhāva iti evam apīṣyamāṇe na kaścid viśeṣaḥ tvadabhimatānupalabdhito 'smadabhimatānupalabdheḥ [T.
SA15arhebt_u:488_184: nanv asty evaivam iṣyamāṇe viśeṣo 'nyabhāvalakṣaṇānupalabdhir itarayā[658]vyavahitā tadabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayed itarā tu sākṣād ity āha -- sa viśeṣo nāsti yena viśeṣeṇānupalabdhyā 'bhāvarūpayā vastusaṃsparśarahitayā 'smadabhimatayā 'bhāvavyavahārasiddheḥ virodhaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:488_185: syāt / anyasya tu viśeṣasya sato 'py abādhakatvād asatsamatvam eva /
SA15arhebt_u:488_187: tad apy asat, yataḥ sa eva tvadabhimato 'nyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktabhūtalātmakas tadviṣayā copalabdhir anupalabdhitveneṣṭā bhavatas tadabhāvasyānupalabdhitvenāsmanmatasya pratiṣedhyābhāvasya tadupalabdhyabhāvasya ca kiṃ kasmāt na sādhanaṃ liṅgam iṣyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:488_188: tathā hi sati lokapratītir anusṛtā bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:488_189: kiṃpunaḥkasmāt punaḥ abhāvasya dvividhasya siddhir eva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ na tatsādhyā kācid anyā [S.
SA15arhebt_u:488_190: 170a] vidyata ity asmanmataniṣedhārthaṃ lokātikrāntam iṣyata iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_191: atrāha -- apṛthaksiddher anyabhāvāt tadabhāvasya pṛthaksiddher abhāvāt kuto liṅgaliṅgitā /
SA15arhebt_u:488_192: tathā sambandhābhāvāc ca anyabhāvatadabhāvayor na liṅgaliṅgiteti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_193: prathamaṃ tāvat kāraṇaṃ [T. 334a.] vivṛṇvann āha anyabhāvas tadviviktapradeśātmakas tāvan na sādhanaṃliṅgaṃ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya,
SA15arhebt_u:488_194: `tadupalabdhir api tadabhāvasya na sādhanam` iti paścād vakṣyate /
SA15arhebt_u:488_195: tadartham eva tāvacchabdaḥ / kasmād anyabhāvo na sādhanam? ity āha -- yatsiddhau yasya vastunaḥ siddhau pratītau yasya aparasya {p.
SA15arhebt_u:488_196: 179.1} vastuno na siddhir na pratītiḥ tad vastu tasya vastuno liṅgaṃ bhavatīty ayaṃ liṅgaliṅginor nyāyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_198: yathā -- yadā dhūmapratītau nāgniḥ pratīyate tadā tayor lliṅgaliṅgibhāvo bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:488_200: yadi nāmaivaṃ tataḥ kim? ity ata āha -- anyasya vastuno yo bhāvaḥsvabhāvaḥ tatsiddhyaiva
SA15arhebt_u:488_202: 170b.] pratiṣedhyasyābhāvaḥ prasidhyati pratīyate anyabhāvasyaiva tadabhāvātmakatvāt tatsiddher eva tatsiddhilakṣaṇatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:488_203: naiyāyikās tu manyante -- pratiṣedhyābhāvo hi prasajyapratiṣedhātmakas tuccharūpas tasya kathaṃ tadanyabhāvarūpatā?,
SA15arhebt_u:488_204: bhāvābhāvayor virodhāt / tataḥ kathaṃ tadanyabhāvasiddhyaiva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ syāt? ity ata āha -- tasya tadanyabhāvasya pradeśalakṣaṇasya tasmād anyena pratiṣedhyena ghaṭādinā asaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya rahitātmanaḥ kevalasya pratiṣedhyena śūnyātmanaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_207: virodhāt?, iti cet; na, pararūpeṇa tasyāpi tuccharūpatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:488_208: [T. 334b.] yathā hy anapekṣitabhāvāntarasaṃsargaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ śūnyavikalpapratibhāsī pratiṣedhyena tuccharūpaḥ tadrūpavirahāt,
SA15arhebt_u:488_211: 171a.] virudhyeta? / svarūpeṇa 2hy ayam atuccharūpaḥ[660]syān na pararūpeṇa,
SA15arhebt_u:488_212: anyathā katham asyānyabhāvatvaṃ parasya vā tatrābhāvaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:488_213: yo hi yadabhāvarūpo na bhavati sa evāsau bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:488_215: tasmāt sarvabhāvāḥ pararūpeṇa niḥsvabhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa rūpavattve 'pīty anavadyam /
SA15arhebt_u:488_217: na kaścit, kevalam anapekṣitarūpāntaram abhāvamātraṃ prasajyapratiṣedha iti loke kathyate /
SA15arhebt_u:488_219: na tu rūpāntaraṃ pararūpatucchātmakaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:488_221: 180.1} tadrūpaśūnyatayā, kathaṃ tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmatā na syāt pararūpeṇa? /
SA15arhebt_u:488_225: 171b.] pratītau tatkāraṇatve sati syāt pratipattiḥ nānyathā /
SA15arhebt_u:488_226: tasya tadanyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya yat tattvaṃ tasya pratiṣedhyatuccharūpatāyā vyavasthāpakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣarūpam tat eva -- na taduttarakālabhāvino [T.
SA15arhebt_u:488_228: tasya gṛhītagrāhitayā smṛtitvenāpramāṇatvāt -- anyasya ghaṭādes tatrāsato vyavacchedasyābhāvasya siddhes tadabhāvātmakasyaiva
SA15arhebt_u:488_229: pradeśasya tena grahaṇāt / dvividho hy ayaṃ pradeśo ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpas tadvyāvṛttarūpatayā tato 'nyo ghaṭavān api,
SA15arhebt_u:488_231: 4tasya tadvivekena[666]pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇe ghaṭād anyatvaṃ ghaṭavirahaś ca gṛhīta eva bhavatīti na vastvasaṃkarasiddhyarthaṃ,
SA15arhebt_u:488_232: `ihedaṃ nāsti` ity evam arthaṃ ca pramāṇāntaram anveṣaṇīyam /
SA15arhebt_u:488_233: vistaraś caitad uttaratra vakṣyata iti āstāṃ tāvat /
SA15arhebt_u:488_234: yataś cānyabhāvasiddhyaiva tadabhāva uktena nyāyena siddhyati tato nānyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya liṅgam /
SA15arhebt_u:488_235: dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyācakṣāṇa āha -- sambandhābhāvāc ca iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_236: anyabhāvatadabhāvayor na [S. 172a.] kaścit sambandho 'sti tataḥ kuto liṅgaliṅgibhāvaḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_237: etac ca kadocyate? / yadā tadabhāvarūpatā 5'nyabhāvasya parānabhyupagatā[667]'pekṣyate /
SA15arhebt_u:488_238: tadanyabhāvāt[668]pṛthag eva tadabhāvas tuccharūpa iṣyate paraiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_239: anyathoktena nyāyenānyabhāvasyaiva tadabhāvarūpatve tādātmyāt kathaṃ sambandhābhāvaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:488_242: tac ca tasya ityādyasyaiva vivaraṇaṃ vyatirekamukhena ekārthasamavāya iti[672][T.
SA15arhebt_u:488_243: 335b.] paradarśanenoktaṃ / pareṣāṃ hinaiyāyikādīnāṃvyatiriktāv eva kṛtakānityatvākhyau dharmāv ekasminn eva dharmiṇi samavetāv iti kṛtakasyānityatvenaikasminn arthe dharmiṇi samavāyaḥ sambandhaḥdhūmasya veti {p.
SA15arhebt_u:488_245: atraikarthasamavāya iti saṃyogaḥ sa eva samavāyaśabdenoktaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:488_247: pareṣāṃ tv agnidhūmau svāvayaveṣv eva samavetāv iti na tayor ekārthasamavāya ādhārādheyabhāvo veti dhūmasyāgner upari darśanāl laukikaḥ sambandha uktaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_249: paramārthato 'gner janakatvāt itarasya ca janyatvād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_250: nanu ceśvarasenena saha vicāraḥ prakrāntaḥ tat kim itinaiyāyikābhimatasyāpi sambandhasyānyabhāvatadabhāvayor abhāva ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:488_251: satyam, [S. 172b.] prasaṅgena tu tanmatasyāpi niṣedhārtham uktam /
SA15arhebt_u:488_252: pūrvaṃ hy anyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddhatvāt pratiṣedhyābhāvasya na tadarthaṃ pratyakṣāntaraṃ `nāstīha ghaṭaḥ` ity evamākāraṃ kalpanīyam iti prasaṅgataḥ kathitam /
SA15arhebt_u:488_253: adhunā tu prasaṅgād idam ucyate -- yadānyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddho 'yaṃ tadabhāvo na bhavati tadā pratyakṣāntaraṃ `nāsti iha ghaṭaḥ` ity evam ākaraṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvalakṣaṇāt 11sannikarṣād iṣṭaṃ bhavatā[673]/
SA15arhebt_u:488_255: atiprasaṅgāt / tataḥ [T. 336a.] kutas tallakṣaṇāt sannikarṣāt tadabhāve[674]pratyakṣaṃ bhaved iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_256: evaṃ sambandhasvarūpam ākhyāya tasyehāsambhavam āha -- naivam,
SA15arhebt_u:488_257: yathā kṛtakatvānityatvayor agnidhūmayor vaikārthasamavāyādilakṣaṇaḥ sambandho naivaṃ kaścid bhāvābhāvayoḥ sambandho yena asya tadabhāvasyānyabhāvaḥ sādhanaṃ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:488_258: yāv ekatrārthe dharmirūpe pravarttete tayor ekārthasamavāyo bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:488_259: anyabhāvaś ca pradeśākhyaḥ svāvayaveṣu yeṣu varttate na tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_260: evaṃ hi pradeśāvayaveṣu ghaṭo nāstīti syāt na pradeśe /
SA15arhebt_u:488_263: na ca ghaṭābhāvo dravyam / navaiva hi dravyāṇīṣyante / na ca kriyāvadādikaṃ dravyalakṣaṇaṃ [S.
SA15arhebt_u:488_264: 173a.] tatrāsti / na ca guṇarūpatayā tatra varttate /
SA15arhebt_u:488_265: caturviśatir eva hi {p. 182.1} guṇā iṣyante / na cāyaṃ teṣām anyatamaḥ / nāpi karmarūpatayapañcasu karmasvanantarbhāvāt[675]tallakṣaṇavirahāc ca /
SA15arhebt_u:488_266: hi tallakṣaṇam / na caitad abhāve sambhavatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_267: nāpi sāmānyādirūpatayā, tadrūpavirahād eva / nāpy anyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ saṃyogo 'gnidhūmayor iva,
SA15arhebt_u:488_269: na ca tadabhāvo dravyam ity uktam /
SA15arhebt_u:488_270: nāpy ādhāra(rā)dheyabhāvo, yataḥ so 'pi saṃyoganimitta ucyate `iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi` iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_271: samavāyanimitto vā, `iha tantuṣu [T. 336b.] paṭaḥ` iti / na cābhāvasyādravyātmanaḥ saṃyogaḥ samasti[676]/
SA15arhebt_u:488_272: nāpi samavāyaḥ, pañcānām eva hi dravyādīnāṃ padārthānāṃ samavāyitvam iṣyate;
SA15arhebt_u:488_274: na ca tadātmānupakāre saty ādhāravyapadeśaḥ sambhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:488_276: na ca tadabhāvo janyaḥ; kāryatāprasaṅgāt / kāryatā cāsyāsambhavinī[677],
SA15arhebt_u:488_277: [S. 173b.] yataḥ svakāraṇasamavāyaḥ, sattāsamavāyo vā kāryatocyate bhavadbhiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_279: trayāṇām eva hi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ dravyaṃ kāraṇam iṣṭam /
SA15arhebt_u:488_280: dravyādilakṣaṇaḥ iti / sattāsamavāye 'pi satpratyayaviṣayatā tadabhāvasya syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:488_281: nābhāvapratyayaviṣayatā / pradeśābhāve 'pi ca ghaṭābhāvasambhavāt kutas tatkāryatā /
SA15arhebt_u:488_283: ekākārajñānaviṣayatvāt / sambandhibhedād bhede vā sāmānyādiṣv api tatprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_284: samavāyopy asyānantaram eva nirasta iti kutaḥ svakāraṇasattāsamavāyarūpā kāryatā tadabhāvasya syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:488_286: tataḥ sarvathā sambandhābhāvān nānyabhāvaḥ tadabhāvasya sādhanam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_287: paraḥ sambandhāntaraṃ darśayann āha -- asti viṣayety ādi /
SA15arhebt_u:488_288: yathā hi artho viṣayaḥ śabdo viṣayīti tayor viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:488_291: śabdārthayoḥ sambandhaḥ {p. 183.1} syād ity abhisambandhaḥ / kiṃ rūpaḥ? / kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇaḥ / kathaṃ punar arthakāryatā śabdasya? /
SA15arhebt_u:488_292: tatpratipādanābhiprāye sati arthapratipādanavivakṣāyāṃ satyāṃ tatprayogāc chabdoccāraṇāt /
SA15arhebt_u:488_293: tenārthena vivakṣāviparivarttinā śabdasya kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:488_294: yady api ca śabdārthayoḥ buddhiparikalpitasāmānyarūpatā tathāpy arthapratibhāsinyā vivakṣayā śabdasāmānyotprekṣānibandhanasya śabdasvalakṣaṇasyotthāpanāt tanmukhena kāryakāraṇabhāva ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:488_295: vā iti paraprasiddhyocyate / paro hy avinābhāvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti vyavaharati /
SA15arhebt_u:488_298: āha -- ayaṃca anantaroktaprakāraḥ atra tadabhāvānyabhāvayoḥ na sambhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:488_301: ghaṭābhāvapratipādanābhiprāyāt prāg api pradeśasya svahetubhya eva niṣpatteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_303: tataś ca kathaṃ tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ? taddvārako 'vinābhāvo vā syāt? yato [T.
SA15arhebt_u:488_305: syān matam -- yathā śabdārthayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvanimitto viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ tathā anyabhāvatadabhāvayor api ity etāvanmātreṇa śabdārthayor dṛṣṭāntatety ata āha -- siddhe hi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:488_306: śabdārthayor hi kāryakāraṇabhāvanibandhanaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ anyathā 'rthāntaratve tadayogāt tathehāpi yadi tadabhāvānyabhāvayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ sidhyet tadā tanmukhena sādhyasādhanabhāvadvāreṇa viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:488_307: yāvatā sa eva sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'sati sambandhe 3kāryakāraṇabhāvādike na sidhyati[680],
SA15arhebt_u:488_311: 184.1} udayāt tathā vyapadeśaḥ, naivam iha, anyabhāvatadabhāvayos tadayogāt /
SA15arhebt_u:488_315: naiva sambandhāntaranibandhano 'nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'pi tu viṣayaviṣayibhāvanimitta eveti cet;
SA15arhebt_u:488_316: āha -- anyathā yadi [T. 338a.] sambandhāntaraṃ neṣyate kin tu viṣayaviṣayibhāvāt sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ tasmāc ca viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:488_318: tathā caikāsiddhau dvayor apy asiddhir bhaved iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_319: kiñcānyabhāvāc ca liṅgabhūtād abhāvasya liṅginaḥ siddhāv anumitāv 4iṣyamāṇāyāṃ asamudāyaś[681]ca sādhyaḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:488_320: anyabhāvena tadabhāvasya kevalasyaiva sādhanāt na kevalasambandhābhāvāt sādhyasādhanabhāvāyogaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_321: samudāyaś ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāpanno dharmadharmilakṣaṇaḥ sādhyo ya iṣṭas tadabhāvadoṣaś ceti `ca` śabdaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_323: āha -- tathā ca dharmamātrasyāpi svatantrasya sādhyatopagame `ghaṭābhāvas tadanyabhāvāt` ity evaṃrūpe prayoge ghaṭasya sarvatra deśe sarvadā cābhāvaḥ prasajyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:488_324: dharmiṇi hi kvaciddharmasya guṇabhūtasya sādhane tatraiva tatkāla eva ca bhāvo yukto nānyadeti sarvatra samudāya eva sādhyo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ na kevalo dharma iti /

SA15arhebt_u:488_341: bhavati / tataḥ sa evānyabhāvaḥ / yad eva hi dṛśyamānaṃ liṅgijñānaṃ janayati tad eva liṅgam ucyate /

SA15arhebt_u:488_349: tataḥ śabdādidharmipratipattāv apy anityatvādyapratītau kṛtakatvādinā tat sādhyata iti yuktam /

SA15arhebt_u:488_377: yata evaṃ tasmād anyabhāvaḥ kevalapradeśalakṣaṇaḥ sādhyasādhanayor bhedābhāvān na sādhanam abhāvasyeti sthitam /
SA15arhebt_u:488_378: tad evaṃ [T. 340b.] samudāyasādhyatāṃ 3liṅgasya ca dharmiṇā sambandhaṃ[686]pratipādayituṃ yad uktaṃ pareṇa -- `pradeśādidharmiviśeṣaṇasyābhāvasya sādhanāt`[687]iti tadapṛthaksiddhidūṣaṇenaiva nirākṛtam /
SA15arhebt_u:488_379: viṣayaviṣayibhāvena tu sambandhapratipādane niraste paro 'nyathā sambandhaṃ sādhyasādhanayor darśayann āha -- asty anyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sambandho virodhākhyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_380: tataḥ sambandhasadbhāvād anyabhāvād abhāvasya siddhir bhaviṣyatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_381: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyasādhanayor virodham evāsambhāvayan pṛcchati -- kena kasya virodhaḥ iti /

SA15arhebt_u:488_383: paro virodham abhiprāyānabhijñātayā darśayati -- anyabhāvena kevalapradeśātmanā pratiyogino yasyābhāvaḥ pramātum iṣṭo ghaṭādes tasyeti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_384: parasyaivaṃvādino asambandhābhidhāyitām ādarśayann āha -- kiṃnu vai pratiyogī ghaṭādiḥ pramātum iṣṭo yena pratiyogināḥ prameyatvena liṅgaliṅginor virodhaḥ sambandho 'bhidhīyate? /

SA15arhebt_u:488_396: / [ŚlV abhāva 26.] iti / tat kathaṃ tatpratipattir evāparasya vyavacchedanam iti tannirāsārtham āha /
SA15arhebt_u:488_397: tasyānyasya pradeśasya [T. 342a.] kevalasya yat tat kaivalyam ekākitvam asahāyatā tad eva aparasya pratiyogino ghaṭādeḥ vaikalyam abhāva iti tasmāt tadanyabhāva eva bhāvāṃśa eva tvad abhimataḥ tadabhāvaḥpratiyogyabhāvāṃśo na tataḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaram ity ucyatesugatasutaiḥ/
SA15arhebt_u:488_398: tataś ca tatpratipattir eva ca tasyānyabhāvasya pratipattir eva 5ca tadapratipattiḥ[688] tasya pratiyogino 'pratipattir abhāvapratipattir iti yāvat /

SA15arhebt_u:488_402: vidyata eva / tadabhāve hi tasyānyavastutaiva hīyeta /

SA15arhebt_u:488_413: vistarataś cāyam abhāvavicāraḥpramāṇadvitvasiddhāv abhāvaṃ prameyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca vicārayatā vihita iti tata evāvadhārya iti /

SA15arhebt_u:488_420: 343a.] tatsāmarthyabhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa tathā nānukṛtaṃ kevalaṃ sammugdhākāram[692]eva tadutpannaṃ tadā kathan tena tatparicchedaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:488_421: syāt? / na hi yadrūpaṃ yadvastu tadrūpānanukāriṇā jñānena tatparicchedo yukto yathā -- śuklaśaṅkharūpānanukāriṇā kāmalinaḥ pītaśaṅkhāvabhāsinā jñāneneti /

SA15arhebt_u:488_426: 180b.] prāptyartho dṛṣṭasyādṛṣṭasya ca parihārārthaḥpravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ sa na syāt /

SA15arhebt_u:488_435: 343b.] anupalambhena ityādi / analapratibhāsinā hi jñānenānalasvarūpan eva pratīyate /

SA15arhebt_u:488_437: tato jñānadvayena tadatadrūpayor vivekāl loke pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ pratiniyato vyavahāraḥ sidhyatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_438: siddhāntavādy āha -- ko 'yam anupalambho nāma iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_439: kadācit paro brūyāt salilopalambhavirahamātram ity ata āha -- yadi salila ity ādi /
SA15arhebt_u:488_440: kumārilasya tu salilopalambhanivṛttimātraṃ tuccharūpam abhāvapramāṇatayā nābhimatam eva /
SA15arhebt_u:488_443: iti vacanāt / kin tu yo 'bhāvātmanaḥ pratiṣedhyavastupratibhāsijñānātmanā 'pariṇāmaḥ sa tadanyavastupratibhāsijñānasahacarito 'bhyupagantavyo na kevala iti param abhyupagamayitum asyopanyāsaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_446: na ca tadanyavastuvijñānapariṇāmād anya eva tasyāpariṇāmo nāma bhavato 'bhimato bhāvāntarasyaivābhāvatvenopagatatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:488_447: tulyayogyatārūpasyaikajñānasaṃsarggiṇa eva cānyavastuno vijñānaṃ tathopeyaṃ nānyasya,
SA15arhebt_u:488_451: rūpāntarāvabhāsitve hi tasya salilopalambhābhāva eva na sidhyet /
SA15arhebt_u:488_453: tadabhāvavyavahāre tv asmadabhimataivānupalabdhir āyāteti pratipādayitum asyopanyāsaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_456: 191.1} abhāvaḥ kasyacit pratipattiḥ pariccheda iti yāvat,
SA15arhebt_u:488_458: atha na tasya pratipattirūpateṣyate kin tu taddhetubhāva ity āha -- pratipattihetur vā iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_459: na hi sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya pratipattiṃ prati hetubhāvo yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:488_460: hetubhāve vā tasyānapekṣitasahakāriṇo nityaṃ tajjñānajananād abhāvajñānam evaikaṃ pratipattuḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:488_462: na cājñātasyāsya nāstitājñānajananaṃ yuktam ity āha -- tasyāpi salilopalambhābhāvasya kathaṃ pratipattiḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:488_463: athāyaṃ salilopalambhābhāvaḥ svayam apratīta eva salilābhāvapratītiṃ janayati tadā kasyacid api /
SA15arhebt_u:488_464: tad evāha -- tasya salilopalambhābhāvasya tato vā salilād anyasyānalādeḥ `vijñānaṃ vā 'nyavastuni` ity ata ātmano 'pariṇāmasya pṛthag avasthāpanāt,
SA15arhebt_u:488_467: tataś ca kasyacid api [S. 182a.] tasya tadanyasya vā 'pratipattāv api yady abhāvaḥ salilādeḥ pratīyate tadā svāpādyavasthāsv api salilādyabhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:488_469: tata evāvadhāraṇīyam / vyavadhānādigrahaṇena caitaddarśayaty anyavastuno 'pi anyatvaṃ tattulyayogyatārūpāpekṣam eva,
SA15arhebt_u:488_470: na tadanapekṣam upeyam / tathā cāsmad upavarṇitānupalabdhisiddhir iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_471: prakāreṇānupalambhena salilābhāvapratītir na yujyate 'nalapratibhāsinaś ca jñānasya pratiniyatākāratā nābhyupagamyate tasmād ayam analadarśī pratipattā 'nalaṃ paśyann api saṅkīrṇarūpapratibhāsinā jñānena `analo 'yaṃ na salilam` iti nādhyavasyati anadhyavasyaṃś ca salilarūpasyāpi pratibhāsanāt tadarthī na tiṣṭhet pravarteta nāpi pratiṣṭheta salilārthī na pravarteta /
SA15arhebt_u:488_472: tathā hi -- salilaṃ nāma tad ucyate yat sarvodanyāsantāpādyapanayanakṣamaṃ[694]sakalatadanyarūpāsaṅkīrṇapratiniyatākārajñānāvabhāsi /
SA15arhebt_u:488_473: idaṃ tv anyad eva śabalarūpaṃ kim apy avabhāsata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_474: {p. 192.1} tataśca pravṛttinivṛttiyor viruddhayor yugapad anuṣṭhātum aśakyatvāt dustaraṃvyasanaṃpratipattuḥsyāt /

SA15arhebt_u:488_477: yathoktadoṣaprasaṅgāt / kin tu yad etad ekasya kevalasyānalasya darśanaṃ tata evānyasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya salilasyābhāvagatir bhavati `vijñānaṃ vā 'nyavastuni` iti vacanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:488_480: tathā hi -- tasmin dṛśyamāne tadevāstīty avagacchatu,
SA15arhebt_u:488_481: tadanyat tu nāstīti kim iti pratyetīti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_482: tasyaiva paridṛśyamānasyānalādeḥ kevalasya salilāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya darśanād analajñāne pratibhāsanāt `salilaṃ nāsti` iti niścayaḥ sañjāyate /
SA15arhebt_u:488_483: tathā hi -- anala iva salilam api yadi tatrābhāviṣyat tadapy analavad darśane pratyabhāsiṣyata tayoḥ svajñānaṃ pratyaviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyā naikasya pratibhāso yuktaḥ /

SA15arhebt_u:488_641: 352a.] āvirbhāvakāla eva 2janmakāle pratītikāla eva[718]vā tadabhāvasiddheś ca /
SA15arhebt_u:488_643: tad eva sādhayati -- na hy anyasya tadviviktasya bhāvaṃ pratipadya pratipattā punar uttarakālaṃ tatpratipatter anyabhāvapratipattes tadabhāvenānyavyatirekau prasādhya pratibindhasādhakena pramāṇena tadabhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
SA15arhebt_u:488_644: kiṃ tarhi? / tadanyaṃ tadviviktarūpaṃ pratipadyamāna eva tasya 3pratiyogino 'bhāvaṃ[719]pratipadyate,
SA15arhebt_u:488_648: na hi `ghaṭo 'tra nāsti` `ghaṭavānayaṃ na bhavati` `saghaṭād anyaḥ` ity arthabhedaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:488_649: kaścit / tataḥ saghaṭād anyatayā kevalapradeśasya darśanam eva ghaṭābhāvadarśanam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_651: kathaṃ jñāyata iti cet / darśanānantaram anvayavyatirekasādhanalakṣaṇena vyavadhānena vinā `idam ghaṭaviviktaṃ pradeśavastv asti` `idaṃ tu ghaṭavastu nāsti` iti pāścātyena vikalpadvayena vyavasthāpanāt[720]/
SA15arhebt_u:488_654: tad eva vyatirekamukhena darśayati -- tac ca tasya ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:488_655: ihāpy asty evānvaya iti cet, āha -- na hy evaṃśakyam ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:488_657: tad ekopalabdheḥ tasyaikasyānanyasaṃsarggiṇo yopalabdhir viśeṣarūpā tasyāḥ kvacid apy anyatrābhāvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:488_658: atha tadviviktopalabdhisāmānyaṃ hetur ucyate -- yatra yatra ghaṭaviviktabhūtalopalabdhis tatra [S.
SA15arhebt_u:488_659: 191a.] tatra ghaṭābhāvo yathā pūrvānubhūte ghaṭavivikte pradeśa ity āha -- sāmānyena pradarśane kriyamāṇe dṛṣṭānte 'pi pūrvānubhūtaghaṭavivikte pradeśe ghaṭābhāvasya prasādhakaṃ pratyakṣādikaṃ pramāṇāntaram anyabhāvaviṣayopalabdher nāsti,
SA15arhebt_u:488_660: kiṃ tu saiva tadanyabhāvopalabdhiḥ sādhyadharmasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya {p.
SA15arhebt_u:488_661: 202.1} sādhikā / sā ca yathā sādhyadharmiṇi tadabhāvasiddhaye dṛṣṭāntam apekṣate tathā
SA15arhebt_u:488_662: dṛṣṭānte 'pi / tathā, tatrāpi tadanyatrāpītyanavasthā dṛṣṭāntānām iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_664: yata evaṃ tasmān na kutaścil lliṅgāt tadanyabhāvāt tadupalabdher vā tadabhāvasiddhir iti /
SA15arhebt_u:488_666: kiṃ 6punar lliṅgatayā [T. 353a.] sādhayati[722]?, ity ata āha -- so 'nyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇena -- pratyakṣasyaiva vivakṣitopalambhād anyatvenānupalambhatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:488_670: mūḍhapratipattau sādhyāyāṃ / yas tv amūḍho [S. 191b.] viṣayapratipattau viṣayiṇaṃ smaraty eva tasyābhāvavyavahāraḥ pratyakṣanibandhana eveti na tatrānupalabdher liṅgateti sucarccitam evānyatretīhālaṃ prasaṅgeneti /
SA15arhebt_u:494_0: tad evam anupalabdher aśeṣavipratipattinirākaraṇena svarūpam avasthāpya prabhedanirddeśārtham āha -- seyaṃyatoktātridhā'nupalabdhiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:494_1: katham? / siddhe tatprasādhakena pramāṇena kāryakāraṇabhāve sati kāraṇasyānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:494_2: kīdṛśasya? / siddhābhāvasya / tathā, vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ tatprasādhanapramāṇabalenaiva siddhābhāvasyaiva vyāpakasya nānyasya vyāpakānupalabdher evāsiddhatāprasaṅgād /
SA15arhebt_u:494_4: evaṃ trividhā 'nupalabdhiḥ / kathaṃ punaḥ kāraṇavyāpakayor abhāvavyavahāraḥ sidhyati yatas tayoḥ siddhābhāvatocyata [T.
SA15arhebt_u:494_5: 353b.] ity āha -- tatra kāraṇavyāpakayor api na kevalaṃ yasya sākṣād abhāvavyavahāraḥ sādhyate /
SA15arhebt_u:494_6: svabhāvānupalabdhau svabhāvasyāsadvyavahārasya siddhir anyasya tadviviktasya bhāvasiddhir yā saivāsadvyavahārasiddhihetutvād evam ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:494_10: 203.1} saviśeṣāṇām upalabdhir na sidhyati tadā'bhāvam abhāvavyavahāraṃvāsādhayati /
SA15arhebt_u:494_11: samuccayārtho vāśabdaḥ / atha kiṃ svabhāvānupalabdhāv apy abhāvo liṅgatayā sādhyata ity āha -- svabhāvānupalabdhau tu ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:494_13: atra parasya vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkyāha -- yadi tarhi kāraṇavyāpakau siddho 'sadvyavahāro yayoḥ tau santau /
SA15arhebt_u:494_14: kena? / tadanyasya karaṇavyāpakaviviktasya bhāvasya siddhir yā pratyakṣātmikā tadrūpayā 'nupalabdhyā,
SA15arhebt_u:494_15: anyasya kāryasya vyāpyasya vā 'bhāvam abhāvavyavahāraṃ ca sādhayataḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:494_16: sā cānyabhāvopalabdhis tayoḥ kāraṇavyāpakayor upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāv eva satyām asadvyavahārasya sādhikā nānyathā ity evam iṣyamāṇe [T.
SA15arhebt_u:494_17: 354a.][S. 192b.] sati kathaṃ tayoḥ kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyoḥ parokṣe 'rthe viṣaye prayogaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:494_18: yadā kāryasvabhāvahetvor vyatirekaprayogaḥ kriyate -- yatra yatrāgnir nāsti tatra tatra dhūmo 'pi nāsti,
SA15arhebt_u:494_19: tathā yatra yatra vṛkṣo nāsti kṣaṇikatā vā tatra tatra śiṃśapā nāsti sattvaṃ vā ity aśeṣapadārthaparigraheṇa vyatirekaprayoge sati /
SA15arhebt_u:494_20: na hi tadāgnivṛkṣavyatiriktāḥ sarve 'rthāḥ pratyakṣatā(kṣā) akṣaṇikatā vā /
SA15arhebt_u:494_22: tathā ca katham aśeṣopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptyā kāryasvabhāvahetvor vyatirekaḥ sidhyet? /
SA15arhebt_u:494_24: tasmāt kvacid adarśanamātrād eva vyatireka eṣṭavyaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:494_27: siddhāntavādy āha -- naiva parokṣe 'rthe kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyoḥ prayogo [S.
SA15arhebt_u:494_28: 193.a] vyatirekopadarśanakāle pramāṇatayā kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā 'nupalabdhiḥ pramāṇabhūtā naiva prayujyate /
SA15arhebt_u:494_29: kasmāt? / liṅgasya kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhilakṣaṇasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya vā aniścayāt tadanupalabdhyoḥ sandeharūpatvāt tadabhāvasya ca [T.
SA15arhebt_u:494_30: 354b.] sandigdhatvāt / kathaṃ tarhi tadā 'nayoḥ prayoga iṣyate? ity āha -- kevalam ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:494_31: kāraṇavyāpakayor hi {p. 204.1} kāryakāraṇabhāvaprasādhakena pūrvoktena pramāṇena vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasādhakena ca tadutpattilakṣaṇe tādātmyalakṣaṇe ca sambandhe sādhite siddhasambandhayor yady abhāvo yatra yatrābhāvaḥ syāt parasyāpi kāryasya vyāpyasya vā 'vaśyaṃ niyamenābhāvo 'nyathā 'hetukatvaprasaṅgāt,
SA15arhebt_u:494_32: niḥsvabhāvatāprasaṅgāc ca / taddvāreṇa pratibandhaprasādhake pramāṇe smṛtiḥ kathaṃ nāma
SA15arhebt_u:494_33: syād ity etasyārthasya darśanārtham ete kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhī prayujyeta iti /
SA15arhebt_u:494_34: darśanādarśanabalena tu sādhane yatraivaikadarśane paro dṛṣṭo 'darśane vā na dṛṣṭaḥ tatraiva tasya bhāvo 'bhāvo vā bhavatu sarvatra tu kasmād bhavati? /
SA15arhebt_u:494_35: na hy apratibaddhātmanāṃ gavāśvādīnāṃ kvacit tathābhāvadarśane 'pi sarvatra tathābhāvo bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:494_36: puruṣasya tu sarvadā kvacid ekabhāvābhāvayor aparasya [S.
SA15arhebt_u:494_39: pramāṇasiddhe saty avaśyam eva yatra yatra kāryaṃ tatra tatra kāraṇam,
SA15arhebt_u:494_40: yatra yatra tadabhāvaḥ tatra tatra ca kāryasyāpy abhāvo 'nyathā kāraṇam antareṇa kāryasya bhāve tasyāhetutaiva syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:494_42: tathā yatra yatra yatsvabhāvas tatra tatra tadbhāvaḥ[726]anyathā tasya nairātmyam eva syād iti vyāptyaivānvayavyatirekopadarśane pratibandhaḥ khyāpayituṃ śakyate nānyatheti prāg eva vistarato vipañcitam /
SA15arhebt_u:500_0: evaṃ kāraysvabhāvānupalabdhilakṣaṇe eva pakṣadharme tatsādhakapramāṇasadbhāvād anvayavyatirekasadbhāvo nānyatreti pratipādyopasaṃharann {p.
SA15arhebt_u:500_1: 205.1} āha -- iti eṣa eva [S. 194a.] svabhāvakāryānupalabdhilakṣaṇaḥ pakṣadharmo 'nvayavyatirekavān pratibandhasadbhāvāt[727]/
SA15arhebt_u:500_2: yataś cānvayavyatirekavān pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇasadbhāvād uktena nyāyena iti tasmāt tadaṃśena vyāpto 'nvayavyatirekaniścayenaiva tadaṃśavyāpter niścayād yathoktaṃ prāk,
SA15arhebt_u:500_3: [T. 355b.] tataś ca tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt trilakṣaṇa eva trirūpa eva trividha eva hetur ggamako nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo vā yathoktatrairūpyasadbhāve rūpāntarasya vaiyarthyāt yathoktatrairūpyābhāve ca rūpāntarakalpanāyām apy avyabhicārābhāvenāgamakatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:500_4: kasmāt trilakṣāṇa eva trividha eva hetur ggamako nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo veti darśayati svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārād iti trilakṣaṇasyaiva svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārāt
SA15arhebt_u:500_5: / svasādhyadharmāvyabhicāra eva ca gamakatvam iti rūpāntarakalpanā vyarthā /
SA15arhebt_u:500_7: tad anena `tridhaiva sa` ity asya trilakṣaṇa eva sa hetur avinābhāvasya svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārasya niyamād avaśyan tayā sadbhāvāt [S.
SA15arhebt_u:500_8: 194b.] pratibandhanimittatadaṃśavyāptyanabhyupage(game) ca rūpāntarakalpanāyām api hetvābhāsās tato 'pare yathoktatrilakṣaṇād apare rūpāntarayogitayā vikalpyamānā hetvābhāsā [T.
SA15arhebt_u:500_9: 356a.] avinābhāvasya svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārasya teṣv abhāvād ity aparo 'rtho darśita iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_0: yaduktaṃ `trilakṣaṇa eva hetur nānyalakṣaṇaḥ` iti tatra pareṣāṃ vipratipattiṃ darśayann āha -- ṣaḍlakṣaṇo hetur ity aparenaiyāyika-mīmāṃsakādayo manyante /
SA15arhebt_u:504_1: kāni punaḥ ṣaḍrūpāṇi hetos tair iṣyaṃte? ity āha -- trīṇi caitāni pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekākhyāni /
SA15arhebt_u:504_3: abādhitaḥ pramāṇenānirākṛto viṣayaḥ sādhyadharmalakṣaṇo yasya sa tathoktaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam aparaṃ rūpam /
SA15arhebt_u:504_5: ekā saṃkhyā yasya {p. 206.1} hetudravyasya tadekasaṃkhyaṃ vivakṣitam ekasaṃkhyaṃ hetudravyam āśrayatvena yasya hetusāmānyasya tadvivakṣitaikasaṃkhyaṃ tadbhāvo 'paraṃ rūpam /
SA15arhebt_u:504_6: yady ekasaṃkhyāvyavacchinnāyāṃ pratiheturahitāyāṃ hetuvyaktau hetutvaṃ bhavati tadā gamakatvaṃ na tu pratihetusahitāyām api 1dvisaṃkhyāyuktāyām iti[728]/
SA15arhebt_u:504_10: na hy ajñāto hetuḥ svasattāmātreṇa gamako yuktaḥ [T.
SA15arhebt_u:504_11: 356b.] iti / tatraiteṣu rūpāntareṣu yad etad abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ nāma tat tāvat pratibandhanibandhanānvayavyatirekātmakā 'vinābhāvasambhave sati tataḥ pṛthag anyallakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:504_12: tadātmakaṃ tu tadvacanenaivoktam iti na vaktavyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_13: kasmāt pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati? bādhāyā avinābhāvasya ca virodhād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_14: tathā hi -- saty apy avinābhāve yathokte bādhāsambhavaṃ manyamānair abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaram ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:504_17: tam eva virodhaṃ sādhayann āha -- avinābhāvo hi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:504_18: saty eva hi sādhyadharme bhāvo hetor avinābhāva ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:504_20: yadi hi saty eva tasmiṃs tadabhāvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravartteta tadā 'sya bhrāntatvād apramāṇataiva syāt
SA15arhebt_u:504_21: iti kuto bādhā? / tataḥ sa hetuḥ tallakṣaṇaḥ sādhyāvinābhāvī dharmiṇi syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:504_23: 195b.] bādhāvakāśaḥ syāt / tasmād avinābhāvasya pramāṇabādhāyāś ca sahānavasthānam avinābhāvenopasthāpitasya dharmiṇi sādhyadharmabhāvasya pramāṇabādhopasthāpitasya ca tadabhāvasya parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇatayā virodhenaikatra dharmiṇy asambhavād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_24: tam eva virodhaṃ saṣṭīkartuṃ paropahāsavyājenāha -- pratyakṣānumāne hi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:504_27: tasmiṃś ca sādhyadharme saty eva tadavinābhāvitvād dhetur bhavaṃs taṃ {p.
SA15arhebt_u:504_28: 207.1} sādhyadharmaṃ niṣkāsyamānaṃ gale gṛhītvā haṭhāt tatraiva dharmiṇyavasthāpayatīti paraṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ vata bhāvānāṃ sādhyadharmalakṣaṇānāmasvāsthyaṃ vartate /
SA15arhebt_u:504_29: tathā hi -- yantradvayaniyantritānāṃ nirucchvāsitayā maraṇam eva prāptam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_30: paro bādhā 'vinābhāvayor viṣayabhedād avirodhaṃ darśayann āha -- anyatra sādhyadharmiṇaṃ parihṛtya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sādhyadharmeṇāvinābhāvī hetur na punaḥ sādhyadharmiṇy eva /
SA15arhebt_u:504_31: tataḥ [S. 196-7a.] kuto bādhā 'vinābhāvayor virodho 'nyatra bādhayā sādhyadharmābhāvasādhanād anyatra ca hetunā tadbhāvasādhanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:504_32: tathā caivaṃvidhe saty api avinābhāve bādhāsambhavād abādhitaviṣayatvasya rūpāntarasya sambhava iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_33: evaṃvidhāvinābhāvopagame saty apy abādhitaviṣayatvādike rūpantare hetvābhāsās tato 'pare rūpāntarasambhavina ity āpāditāṃ hetvābhāsatāṃ vivarītuṃ paropahāsapūrvakam āha -- tat kim ayaṃ sādhyadharmī tapasvī varākaḥ śaḍḍh(ṇḍha)m udvāhya tasmin sādhyadharmasādhanaśāktivikalaṃ [T.
SA15arhebt_u:504_35: etad eva vyanakti -- yasya hetor ddharmiṇy asaty api sādhyadharme bhāva iṣyate,
SA15arhebt_u:504_37: taṃ tathāvidhaṃ sādhyadharmiṇy upadarśya kathaṃ dharmī sādhyadharmavān ity ucyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:504_38: na hy 'mbhastvasya[730]samudre[731]lavaṇatvenāvinābhave 'pi tadvyatirikte 'mbhasi lavaṇatayā sādhyatveneṣṭe 'mbhastvabhāve 'pi lavaṇatvasiddhir iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_39: parasya vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkhyāha -- ata eva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:504_40: etad eva vivṛnoti -- syād etad bhavato matam /
SA15arhebt_u:504_41: yata eva hetur anyathā 'pi sādhyadharmam antareṇāpi dharmiṇi bhaved ambhastvādiṣu tathādarśanāt,
SA15arhebt_u:504_42: sādhyadharmiparihāreṇa cāvinābhāopagamāt ata eva kāraṇāt pramāṇābhyām abādhitadharmā dharmīty ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:504_44: 196-7b.] hetor viṣayaḥ sādhyadharmo na bādhyate yathā 'mbhastvasya lavaṇatvam,
SA15arhebt_u:504_45: tadā tasya gamakatvam, nānyatheti / tato 'nyatrāvinābhāvamātreṇa sādhyasiddher anabhyupagamāt na yathokto doṣa iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_47: 358a.] yadā hetor dharmiṇy avinābhāvitānabhyupagamāt sādhyasiddher abhāvāt tatsiddhaye rūpāntaram abādhitaviṣayatvam ucyate tadā hetor na kiñcit sāmarthyam /
SA15arhebt_u:504_48: kasmāt? abādhayaiva hetum antareṇāpi sādhyasiddheḥ akiñcitkara eva hetuḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:504_49: tathā hy atra kalpanādvaiyam -- bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo niyato vā syād? aniyato vā? /
SA15arhebt_u:504_50: tatra yadi pūrvo vikalpas tadā sādhyābhāvo hi bādhakapramāṇasya vṛttau niyataḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:504_52: tasmād abādhāyāṃ bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve tanniyatasya sādhyābhāvasyāpy abhāvāt sādhyasiddheḥ bhavaty eveti vyartha eva hetur iti nopanyasanīya eva /
SA15arhebt_u:504_54: syān matam -- mā bhūd bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve hetoḥ sāmarthyam,
SA15arhebt_u:504_55: yadā tu sādhyasya bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ dharmiṇi varttate tadā hetoḥ sādhyasādhane
SA15arhebt_u:504_57: 198a.] āha -- bādhāyām api iti / yadi bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ varttate tadā tena sādhyābhāvasya dharmiṇi sādhanāt punar brahnaṇāpi tadbhāvasya karttum aśakyatvāt kim aṅga 3punaḥ śaṣṭhena hetuneti[732]kutaḥ sādhanasya hetoḥ sāmarthyam? /
SA15arhebt_u:504_58: ata [T. 358b.] eva hi bhavadbhir abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaram ucyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_59: atha bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo na niyataḥ tadabhāve 'pibhāvād iti dvitīyaḥ pakṣa iṣyate tad apy abādhāyāḥ sāmarthyaviraha iti darśayann āha -- aniyame bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvasyeṣyamāṇe satīdam āpatitam /
SA15arhebt_u:504_60: na ca -- bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt sādhyābhāvasya ca sambhavaḥ iti na sādhyasādhane sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ satyām api sādhyābhāvasya smbhavād iti tadyogino 'pi hetvābhāsataiveti /
