SA15arhebt_u:504_374: pare darśanādarśanamātreṇa -- ye darśanādarśane pratibandhasādhake na bhavataḥ -- tanmātreṇa vyavasthāpayanti yata eva[770] iti tasmāt teṣāṃ vādināṃ niśedhārtho 'yaṃ lakṣaṇe niścitaśabdaḥ prayuktaācāryeṇāsmābhiś cābhyupagata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_375: yadi tu paravipratipattiḥ na syāt tadā naivāsau prayujyeteti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_376: kim iti punar darśanādarśanābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvaviśayābhyāṃ sapakṣā[sa]pakśayoḥ viśiṣṭau bhāvābhāvāv anvayavyatirekātmakau [T.
SA15arhebt_u:504_377: 371b.] neṣyeta ity āha -- sator api ityādi saty api kvacit sapakṣe bhāvadarśane hetoḥ kvacic cāsapakṣe 'bhāvadarśane `sa śyamaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:504_379: tathā hi -- anvayo nāma sarvatra saty eva sādhye hetor {p.
SA15arhebt_u:504_380: 225.1} bhāvo vyāptyā cāsati sādhye hetor abhāvo vyatirekaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:504_381: na ca kvacit sati sādhye [S. 212b.] hetor bhāvadarśane 'pi tanmātreṇa tathābhāvaḥ sarvatra bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:504_383: tathā kvacit sādhyābhimatasyābhāve saty abhāvadarśane 'pi hetoḥ sarvatra tadabhāve 'vaśyam abhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:504_385: tasmāt pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva yathoktau sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau sidhyataḥ nānyatheti vipratipattinirāsārtham eva niścitagrahaṇaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:504_386: kṛtam ity upadarśayann āha -- tasmāt ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:504_387: asmābhiḥ ityācāryakṛte niścitagrahaṇe 'nyatrāsmākam abhimatatvāt asmābhiḥ ity āha /
SA15arhebt_u:504_389: asatyāṃ tu vipratipattau tan na kartavyam eveti pratipādya ata eva nyāyāt jñātatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ na bhāvatīti [T.
SA15arhebt_u:504_392: kutaḥ? / tenaiva trairūpyavacanenaiva tatsādhanapramāṇākṣepataḥ avagatatvāt pratipannatvād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_394: yathā pakṣadharmatvavacanenaiva hetor upanayasyārtho 'vagatas tasya dharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvapradarśanātmakatvāt,
SA15arhebt_u:504_396: 213a.] rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati; tathā trairūpyāt jñānaṃ, tadvacanenaivāvagatatvād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_397: atra paro 'niṣṭam āpādayann āha -- anvayavyatirekayor api ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:504_398: yadi trairūpyavacanenaiva sāmarthyāj jñānaṃ labhyata iti tat tataḥ pṛthag na vaktavyam hanta tarhi anvayāt pṛthag vyatireko na vaktavyaḥ vyatirekāc ca pṛthaganvayaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:504_399: kiṃ kāraṇam? / ekasyānvayasya vyatirekasya vā prayogād ubhayasya gateḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:504_401: tathā jñātatvasyāpi trairūpyād gamyamānasyāpi pṛthagvacanaṃ karttavyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_402: siddhāntavādy āha -- na, hetoḥ ityādi / nānvayavyatirekayor na pṛthaktvaṃ kintu bhinnarūpataiva /
SA15arhebt_u:504_403: tathā hi -- anvayo hetoḥ {p. 226.1} sapakṣe bhāva ucyate, vyatirekaḥ punar abhāvo 'sapakṣe /
SA15arhebt_u:504_406: na ca yo yato bhinnasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāntarbhūto yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:504_407: nanu ca yady anvayavyatirekayor bhinnarūpatā kathaṃ tarhi trairūpaṃ liṅgam ucyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:504_408: na hi parasparabhinnāv ātmānāv evāsya yujyate,
SA15arhebt_u:504_411: 213b.] vyavasthāpyete na vā nayo(-pyete tathā tayo)r anantarbhāva ucyate nānyathā /
SA15arhebt_u:504_415: vyāvṛttibhede 'pi ca paramārthato bhedo nāstīty ekaṃ liṅgaṃ trirūpam ity ucyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_416: kathaṃ tarhi prāguktam[771]`nānayor arthaḥ kaścid bhedaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:504_417: anyatra prayogabhedād` iti? ata āha -- ekaṃvākyam ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:504_418: anvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa vā prayuktam ekaṃ vākyam ubhayam anvayaṃ vyatirekaṃ ca bhinnalakṣaṇam eva gamayatīty ucyate 'smābhir naiko 'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyocyate,
SA15arhebt_u:504_420: atra para āha -- natu(nu) tatraiva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:504_421: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- lakṣaṇavākyapratipāditāv anvayavyatirekāv āśritya parasparāntarbhāvaścodyate /
SA15arhebt_u:504_422: sa ca vidyata[772]eva / tathā hi -- `tatraiva bhāvaḥ` ity atra lakṣaṇavākye tadarthatayā[773]tadabhāve 'bhāvo gamyate;
SA15arhebt_u:504_424: 373a.] cātra `tadbhāve bhāvaḥ` / na hy asati pratibandha ekābhāve 'parasyābhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:504_425: pratibandhaś ca tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ tadbhāve bhāvarūpa eva /
SA15arhebt_u:504_427: 214a.] prativiśiṣṭena lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagater dvitīyavacanaṃ na karttavyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_429: tataś ca yaduktam `anvayavyatirekayor api tarhi na pṛthaktvam iti` tat tadavastham eveti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_430: {p. 227.1} siddhāntavādy āha -- vacanam etad `tatraiva bhāvaḥ` ityādirūpam ubhayamākṣipati pratipādayati /
SA15arhebt_u:504_432: niyamas vyāpakasya `sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` iti sāvadhāraṇasya dvitīyākṣepanāntarīyakatvāt dvitīyapratipādananāntarīyakatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:504_433: na ca tāvataikavākyapratipādanamātreṇobhayor ekasvabhāvatā bhinnasvabhāvānām apy athānām ekavākyena pratipādanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:504_434: ekenaiva ca lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagatāv api yat pṛthaabhidhānaṃ tat prayoganiyamārtham /
SA15arhebt_u:504_436: vaidharmyaprayoge ca sādharmyavacanam iti na punar ekābhidhānenānavagatasya rūpāntarasya pratipādanārtham /
SA15arhebt_u:504_437: na ca tathā trairūpyavacanena jñānanibandhanena jñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ paropalakṣaṇāthena ca śāstrapraṇayanenāśritajñānasyaiva trairūpyasya [S.
SA15arhebt_u:504_438: labdhasya jñānasya punarvacane na kiñcit prayojanam astīti nāsya pṛthagvacanaṃ yuktam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_439: syānmatam -- kevalāv api tarhy ekavākyārthānantarbhūtau parasparama'bhinnasvabhāvau bhaviṣyataḥ tata evaikavākyārthāntarbhāvād ity ata āha -- na punaḥkevalau ekavākyārthānapekṣau tadantarbhāvamātreṇa sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau parasparam ākṣipato 'ntarbhavataḥ bhinnarūpāṇām apy arthānām ekavākyāntarbhāvadarśanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:504_440: nanu ca niyamavantāv api bhāvābhāvau kevalāv eva,
SA15arhebt_u:504_441: tayoḥ parasparākṣepe kevalayor api tatprasaṅga ity ata āha -- niyamavantau ca sāvadhāraṇavākyapratipāditau na kevalau kintu sahitāv eva /
SA15arhebt_u:504_442: kutaḥ? / niyamasya sāvadhāraṇasya vākyasya ubhayarūpatvāt bhāvābhāvapratipādanātmakatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:504_443: tad evaṃ sāvadharaṇena [T. 374a.] vākyena naiva kevalo 'nvayo vyatireko vā 'bhidhīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:504_444: tadantarbhāvāt tu dvitīyagatiḥ kintu parasparānantarbhūtāv eva sahitāv ekena vākyenābhidhīyeta iti pratipādyopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt tatraiva [S.
SA15arhebt_u:504_445: 215a.] sapakṣa eva bhāva {p. 228.1} ity anena vākyena na sapakṣe bhāva evocyate /
SA15arhebt_u:504_446: kiṃ tarhi? / asapakṣe 'bhāvo 'pi, tathā cetareṇāpy asapakṣe 'bhāva eveti vacanena nābhāva eva kevala ucyate kintu sapakṣe bhāvo 'pi,
SA15arhebt_u:504_447: yena kevalavacanena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā tadātmakatayā dvitīyam ākṣiped yato 'nayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:504_448: tasmād yadā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvāv abhipretau tadā tau bhinnarūpāv eveti kathaṃ tayoḥ na pṛthaktvam? /
SA15arhebt_u:504_449: atha niyamavatā vākyenābhihitau tadaikavākyād evobhayagateḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na karttavyam eva /
SA15arhebt_u:504_450: tat tu kṛtaṃ nāpratipannapratipattaye kintu prayoganiyamārtham ity uktam etad iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_451: syānmatam -- yathā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau na parasparātmakau tataś ca tayoḥ parasparato rūpāntaratvam,
SA15arhebt_u:504_452: evaṃ paropalakṣaṇaśastrapratipāditāt trailakṣaṇyād bhidyata eva jñānam,
SA15arhebt_u:504_453: na tatrāntarbhūtam, tato rūpāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata [T.
SA15arhebt_u:504_454: 374b.] āha -- naivam, yathā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau parasparam anantarbhūtau,
SA15arhebt_u:504_457: 215b.] upalakṣaṇa(ṇaṃ) trairūpyaviṣayāṃ pratītiṃ kāryante yena śāstreṇa tato yat trailakṣaṇyaṃ pratīyate āgṛhītajñānaṃ tasmād avyatirekād āgṛhītajñāne trailakṣaṇye 'ntarbhāvād iti yāvat,
SA15arhebt_u:504_458: iti tasmān na lakṣaṇāntaraṃ trairūpyād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:504_459: tad ayam atra samudāyārthaḥ -- yadi jñātatvaṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ uktena prakāreṇa jñānam evocyate tadā talliṃgasyānātmabhūtam iti
SA15arhebt_u:504_460: na tallakṣaṇam / athāvi(pi )jñānāpekṣaḥ karmabhāvo jñātatvam ucyate tadā 'pi jñeyasattāvyavasthāyā jñānasattānibandhanatvāt trairūpyavyavasthaiva tatsattāvyavasthāpakaṃ jñānam ākṣipati /
SA15arhebt_u:504_461: tatas tadapekṣo 'pi karmabhāvo 'nuktasiddha iti na tadvacanaṃ pṛthakkarttavyam /
SA15arhebt_u:504_463: tad evam abādhitaviṣayatvādikaṃ rūpatrayaṃ nirākṛtya nigamayann āha -- tasmān na hetuḥṣaḍlakṣaṇaḥ/
SA15arhebt_u:504_472: na guror upadeśam agrahīt bubudhe vastu tato ... ... dhīḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:504_473: yatato sma na tasya vṛddhaye na parispanditum apy apārayat // [1 //]
SA15arhebt_u:504_474: jīvātmakaṃ cāndramasaṃ ca tejaḥ kṛtāspadaṃ tasya tai ...t /
SA15arhebt_u:504_475: tad eva śaktā ...thā paratra citrā hi viśvaprakṛti...nāḥ // 2 //
